review_body: I have never used this service and decided to register. However, I wasn't even able to fully complete registration because my account was blocked for some random reason. It was locked straight after they charged my card. (I received my money back eventually) Their support said, "We understand it may be frustrating, however, weâ€™re unable to share details regarding what led to this decision". Nice service guys! I just wanted to run my application and I wasted my time instead.

name: Vish
review_body: The best cloud platform with amazing support, on point service, no hidden charges

name: Tahsin Demiral
review_body: At Digital Ocean Support, They really listens and review your case and find customized solutions, not just automated replies. This is great!

name: MÄƒdÄƒlin Rusu
review_body: I was looking for an affordable service like this one for some time. I've used DigitalOcean services in the past, but I really didn't like them back then. I recently moved a bunch of websites on their services and everythig went smooth like butter. I started to test them 204 days ago, I know that because that's the date when I migrate one of the websites. The only downside, if you can consider it downside is the pricing model which can trick you until you get used to it.

name: Akash NP
review_body: A great cloud platform for not just indie devs like me but even for big organizations. Their products are high quality, never faced any downtime. Their prices are affordable & predictable. They have a great support community filled with quality resources and support agents to help us out if we are facing any issue

name: SÃ¡ndor BÃ¡rÃ¡ny
review_header: One of the best cloud services
review_body: The support has not only very high technical competence but one can feel how they are eager to help. The response time is unusually fast. The first level can handle a broad field of problems, but I have noticed how fast they involve second level when necessary. I should not speak much about the technical resources because they are simply working, on a very satisfactory niveau. Thanks!

name: Morska
review_body: They lied me! Not started funds althought they show it (100$), and will take your money when you import you credit card and you don't use them, they will take your money too! Very Bad service!

name: BÃ¶rcsÃ¶k BarnabÃ¡s
review_body: Straightforward and dependable service for a reasonable price. I've been using their VPS service for >1 year now.

name: Olatunji Awesu
review_header: Your platform locked my account almostâ€¦
review_body: Your platform locked my account almost immediately after I created my account. I was embarrassed and infuriated. I reached our to your customer service team and subscribed to AWS immediately after I did as I had a deadline to meet. The service failure recovery measure your team did 'wowed' me. I am delighted and impressed by the resolution and speed of response. Unfortunately, I had already taken the initial business to Amazon due to the urgency, but I will definitely bring future projects to Digitalocean. You guys rock!!!

name: Marin Pavic
review_body: While the service is good when it works Pray to whatever you believe in that you will never get randomly banned by their "automated system" My 3 year old inactive account has been magically banned after i tried logging in again Their support is complete trash and getting any info why it happened is completely impossible. And they could not revert it...

name: Bryce A. Lynch
review_header: I did not expect to get a response toâ€¦
review_body: I did not expect to get a response to my support request before CoB because I'm not a big corporate customer. Not only was response fast but I even had a resolution before CoB. I know that's kind of a low bar, but that kind of service happens so rarely anymore I find it very surprising and worthy of a bit of celebration.

name: samson olusola
review_header: digital ocean offer best high valueâ€¦
review_body: digital ocean offer best high value hosting service you can trust and they server can handle thousands of user without problems

name: Sylvion Finisie
review_body: One of the most attractive features of DigitalOcean is its simplicity. The platform is designed to be user-friendly, with a clean and intuitive interface that makes it easy to manage infrastructure. This is particularly beneficial for developers who may not have extensive experience with cloud technologies. Another key advantage of DigitalOcean is its affordability and tech support.

name: Sajad Adnani
review_body: It was so great Your service and your support team are amazing.

name: Nelson Pina
review_header: DO team helped to solve a singular problem with a K8S upgrade affecting a specific service/deployment in only one cluster
review_body: DO team helped me to understand where my problem could be, despite they couldn't replicate the error on their side. They gave alternative solutions for a service I was using to collect some data/metrics from our clusters. Besides, they were always very fast in replying, and interested in understanding, replicating, and solving the problem. I truly recommend it. Nelson

name: Ben
review_body: Engineers answer questions promptly and in a professional way. This makes us trust Digitalocean in every aspect as a startup Project. We are proud of your approach, this gives us room to scale up in a short space of time. Your expertise is our tool to success.

name: Faisal Nur Rohman Effendi
review_body: For me who used only 1 month, I got good experience regarding uptime, connection and server performance for a small website on the basic package.

name: Jake Adams
review_header: You can lose everything at anytime without any notice for no reason at all
review_body: From DO Terms of Service Agreement: 12. Termination: "...we reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to terminate your access to all or any part of the Websites and/or Services at any time, with or without notice, effective immediately. " So if you use DO, you can lose everything at anytime without any notice for no reason at all. Is it sensible to trust them with your project under these terms? I think not.

name: VPSWizard
review_body: After trying some vps provider vulter, aws, alibab cloud, kamatera. I found that DigitalOcean and linode are the only ones who didn't complain about cpu usage. Response of the support to Refund of rest credit was done quick

name: Long charmroeun
review_body: third time account lock just 1 answer from support wrong lock account and their support answer took very long time but they block only 1 second as they one???

name: Ryan
review_body: Absolute scam artists. I created a temporary droplet and database back in January whilst I had my $200 free credits. This was online for no longer than 1â€“2 hours. I then proceeded to delete these as I no longer needed them as I was only wanting to test something real quick. They had me thinking both were completely deleted. Beginning of March, they proceed to take money from my PayPal/Bank account. I have proceeded to multiple times to gain a refund, and they flat out refuse and keep telling me I'm ineligible for one, which we all know is an absolute lie. To put things in to perspective. This alleged invoice was dated for January 2023. My free credit ran out at the end of February 2023. They waited until the Beginning of March, after my free credit ran out, to bill me for something which wasn't even due in the first place as I had deleted my services with them. I have been back and forth with them all week and getting nowhere. They have had plenty of chances to admit their wrong doings and rectify this. I will now be going out of my way to ensure the world knows what scammers they are. DO NOT sign up for their services at all for any reason as they will also scam you as well.

name: craig caldwell
review_header: Information is not deleted when you close your account
review_body: I was only on the Digital Ocean site for 10 minutes. I did not select a plan as it was unclear what I would be signing up for. I deactivated my account within the hour. Yet I am getting emails about potential billing, and when I contact support, they agree I deactivated my account, but they want me to provide all my credit card information through an email to determine if I have other accounts with them. Everything about this is dodgy... don't delete my information; must sign up with credit card information before seeing what I could choose, want my credit card information through email... this is wrong in so many ways.

name: Yasir Kadhim
review_header: Instant account lock with no explanation or help
review_body: After hearing a lot about digital ocean I've decided to test it out, create an account to host my database. Upon creating my account and providing my credit card, I've been immediately charged and account locked. No email explanation or nothing, after reaching out via support I've got a response within 1 minute saying that Hello, Thank you for registering for a DigitalOcean account. Our automated security tooling identified patterns that suggest your account is not eligible for activation, which resulted in an account lock. After review by our support staff, we have determined that restoring access to your account will not be possible. which is absurd, I suggest trying other services as doing business like this is unacceptable

name: Luke S
review_header: Arbitrarily deleted all my data, no recourse
review_body: Locked my account for breaching the terms of service. Wasn't doing anything remotely questionable. Fair enough though, reached out to ask why and to get it unlocked. They wouldn't tell me why, told me they had already conducted a 'final review' and that I wouldn't even be able to migrate my data off their platform! Google them to see many other similar stories (I wish I had before using them). Not suitable for any production service, but ok otherwise as long as you are making very frequent backups.

name: Paul
review_header: I thought I'd add to his as theâ€¦
review_body: I thought I'd add to his as the negative reviews seem to be growing larger and more legitimate. I bought a server from DO to carry my employers sites across - utilising the ability to increase droplet resources when required. 1st domain I moved across I ended up moving it back to Shopify. The domain wouldn't resolved properly - it was using DOs DNS. Every email I got back from support led to support articles and never an actual resolve. I missed the deadline twice hence ended up moving it to Shopify. 2nd domain I haven't moved yet, but seeing it's run by amateurs and DO themselves say it's not foolproof - they seem to be OK enough to take you money. I think it's good if you want a quick/cheap server for testing out various technologies - but for commercial use, a definite NO. And, DO, a support ticket to yourselves isn't going to resolve the matter because by the looks of it your responses here are also generic/replicated.

name: Ida Bagus Gede Pramana Adi Put
review_body: Price increased than their most competitors who does the same or even a bit better, such as Vultr, Linode, etc.

name: Reed T
review_body: i have made numerous attempts at contacting this company concerning intrusion attempts on my computer showing them to be the source. they make it impossible to contact them through deceptive and non functional forms and lack of information. this concerns both their New Jersey and Amsterdam locations. if you are a company with any sense of integrity, i certainly would not use any services connected with this company. nothing but a home for hackers ........ Note- i have been asked for extra information for my review to be posted however it asks for personal info.. i have not done business with this company.. it is who they serve that are trying to access my computer. on their abuse form i was unable to complete it because it kept telling me i was not using the correct date format; i was using it correctly and yet was unable to submit the form due to their 'glitch'... otherwise the form is for one incident and i am having four or more per day.. i have tried their way and it did not work-------------- From the reply from Digital Ocean- my reply to them...-----I understand that you cannot monitor each of your 'customers' manner of useage. However I still get several intrusion attempts a day from any of at least three of Digital Ocean's client locations. The abuse contact form is the same one that I am unable to submit due to non-acceptance of the date format, which renders the form unuseable. I am supposed to submit one of these forms for each incident that occurs which would take considerable time each day- if the form worked at all... It is as if no one read that part of my review. So as of now nothing has changed.. my review stands.. ---------- ------- now after the reply from Digital Ocean i have once again attempted to report this on their own abuse support form.. and once again i am unable to complete the form.. this time it is not the date format but the time zone selection which is flagged.. however the time zone information is a drop down menu of their own and i selected the correct one... how can i have it incorrect when it is their own menu? so, once again, i cannot think that the company is interested in actually combatting abuse at all... again, my review stands and their reply is false... .... update 3/7/23- i was finally able to complete their abuse form and have heard nothing back from them. how exactly, when they do not respond, am i to believe they have done anything about my complaint? and i keep getting the same attempts linked to the same ip address as digital ocean and my abuse form complaint.. nothing has been done.. a 0 star company...

name: Ankush Mittal
review_body: Great service and support, the products itself are transparent and uptime is great, support is clear in their responses and communication is spot on about all policies unlike some other companies.

name: Marcil
review_body: cheap cloud vps hosting provider! We are use their service continuously for over 5 years!

name: Jeff Cold
review_body: An online trainer offered a $100 credit to use droplets for the training. I had two droplets that were only ever booted up while I was using them for a few hours. I found out DO was taking $96 out of my CC every month for three months. Because I got one of the charges disputed, DO closed my account.

name: Yrok Kory
review_body: Helpful support and good services.

name: Merouane
review_body: Very Bad Experience, They Close My Account Without Any Reason And Telling Me that they could not share the reason for the closure with me. i Lost a Lot of my Info In My RDP's.

name: sublamto
review_body: The account Locked without any explanation. There response : I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused by this. Additionally, please note that weâ€™re unable to share details regarding what led to this decision as this is critical to maintaining our security systems.

name: bo hartelius
review_body: Stay away from them they host spammers and hackers

name: Shop Treck
review_body: Very very bad they are scammers locked my account for no reason and deleted my droplets. Worst company vultr was way better.

name: Humberto T
review_header: Iâ€™ve been using DO for few years nowâ€¦
review_body: Iâ€™ve been using DO for few years now and I have never had a problem. Reports of accounts being closed without access is a little concerning - hopefully these are isolated incidents that relate to billing.

name: habib
review_body: The most convenient cloud service provider at the AWS level. I use several virtual machine applets for my projects, quite cheap and a lot of instructions on the platform. I really hope that soon you will introduce crypto payment!

name: Med
review_body: So far they are okay, the downside of their services is Port 25 is blocked and you cannot open it even if you contacted support and explain why you need it.

name: Olbrich Attila
review_header: I've been using DO for more then 3 years.
review_body: I don't understand why are there so many bad reviews. I am using DigitalOcean for more than 3 years. I see that the provided services are growing rapidly, and it is really easy to work with them, they are so innovative like with the App platform, and it was way much easier to set up a Kubernetes cluster than with another cloud provider. I've also tried to set up the same service on AWS and here, and the cost was about the third, so I would recommend trying them out.

name: Vishal Paswan
review_header: Stay Away if you dont want to loose your websites data
review_body: It was going good for a few months & I was getting decent performance from their basic droplets. But a few days back I got a mail regarding Verify Your Account: I tried my best to give them answers but still, my account got locked & it seems they warned me never to use them. Or maybe they have disk failure a few days back & they loose my all data & playing these dirty tricks to get rid of me... so they can get an excuse to say sorry for data. OK np, I will be happy to migrate somewhere else but 1st cooperate with me to get me a backup. I have seen a pathetic response so far. Thanks & Regards

name: Victor Aleksejevs
review_header: They deleted all my information with no way back
review_body: Dear people, I am one of those who suffered from these guys - Digital Ocean. I was a client for 3 years, I stored all my website and CRM data there, I spent thousands of dollars and thousands of hours on those projects. I paid a fee of $12 every month to keep my account. My card expired while I was sick, I didn't know about it. Since they didn't receive my payment for only $12 (TWELVE!!!), they simply DELETED all my stored information FOREVER with no way to get it back. That's the end of my story. There are plenty of such reviews here. Don't make the same mistake, and find some different place where to store your info. Digital Ocean doesn't care about their clients, about people, about anything. They are..."not smart"!

name: Judith Meyer
review_body: I paid for weekly backups for one of my droplets and according to the log there should have been 3 weeks' worth of backups, but when I needed one (a teammate accidentally deleted the droplet), they told me 0 out of 3 backups were available to restore the droplet. So in fact they are ripping you off on this "backup" service. Ensure you have off-site backups and don't pay for them.

name: BS
review_header: They have the option on the website toâ€¦
review_body: They have the option on the website to contact sales, and once you fill the form you receive automatic email " We received your submission on our contact sales form. We apologize that we cannot help by connecting you with a member of our sales team. While weâ€™d like to spend one-on-one time with every single person who has a question, we do not have a team large enough to respond to each question we receive. " This is clearly a joke company they don't care about startups and put priority on only big clients. So if you plan to spend $10k /mo don't expect the answer. Terrible

name: Igor Otaviano
review_header: Never had any problems with them
review_body: Never had any problems with them, as far as their severa they work fine for me.

name: Boris Panov
review_header: Just another company that grew too big and stopped caring
review_body: Digital Ocean is just another example of companies getting too big and no longer caring about their clients. When I first stated using their services, my experience was great. Now, I can't even speak to customer service without getting the same AI generated response over and over again. They used to care about every single customer but now they're too big to care if you stay or leave. If you're considering using Digital Ocean, you just have to cross your fingers in hopes that you don't run into any issues. Because customer service will do NOTHING to resolve your issues.

name: Penkie
review_body: Digitalocean's downfall. 3 years ago was its golden year. It worked like a charm, everything was perfect. But now, we have a control panel which is a huge mess now and laggy; and also made me pay 2 droplets that were invisible (they paid me back so that's good). And the pricing rised so much, and it's not because of inflation, they said that themselves, they said it's because their clients are not small developers anymore and have to rise the price. So if you're a small developer, just run somewhere else where they'll welcome you and don't look back.

name: Bender A
review_body: Good hosting, had no issues with them. Cheaper than most major competitors. Easy to configure a cloud VPN server. Recommend it if you need a personal cloud server for running your pet projects or learning.

name: V Cizek
review_body: My server got PERMANENTLY deleted After few years of service my server got permanently deleted after 5 weeks since the last bill was issued. I paid on monthly basis for years and it slipped me by this time. After 5 weeks I got an email, which said your droplet has been deleted. And wow, yes, it has. It's gone. It's gone good and forever. All my custom software, databases, everything I had on it is gone. Because I didn't pay up $14 in timely fashion. After years and years of being paying customer. I had no business critical data on it. I will recover from this, but you make sure you can. This can happen to you and DO has absolutely no problem to delete your data in no time. Knowing, what I know now, I would not give my data to this company, they are ruthless. If you can afford to wake up one day to find out everything is gone, go for it, DO does offer some fantastic service. Ticket no: #06697323 As you can see, Digital Ocean replied with promise of help. This is just a facade, no help came before or after this message. How could it anyway, the server was already gone.

name: Ã–mer Ä°lyaslÄ±
review_body: I have used Digital Ocean for more than 2 years and I regret it. I started over the recommendation of our freelancer, but in 2 years, I always had a hard time, from setting up, to managing, to backup, and performance, everything was very hard and confusing for me. And whenever I had a problem and opened a ticket, I only received automated responses and never heard from a real person answering my messages! In the end, one of my sites was hacked because of Digital Ocean and they didn't even bother to respond to me for anything at all! I finally pulled the plug and changed to another hosting provider which I am happy with! So, in short, if you are not a genius with IT, stay away from Digital Ocean. Or if you use, pray that you will not have any problems and will need technical support, because if you do, support will be nowhere to be found! Stay away at all costs! You will regret it!

name: Gary Slade
review_body: i have not used DO for anything, didn't even know they existed until they charged my Amex $50, then a few weeks later $123 . I emailed their billing dept and heard nothing. Tried calling their phone # and mailbox is full ! Something not right here !! Amex got my money back but no idea how they charged me in the first place

name: Anonymous
review_header: I created an account and when I attemptâ€¦
review_body: I created an account and when I attempt to login, I see "Account Locked". I reached out to DigitalOcean support twice yet they haven't responded to my support tickets in three days.

name: Kian Mayne
review_header: Apps feature is PERFECT for personal projects
review_body: As a full-time software engineer, the time I have for personal projects is limited so the DigitalOcean Apps platform is an absolute godsend for me. In a few minutes, I can go from having code running locally only to having it deployed publicly on my domain with full CI setup from Github. The price? Free for front-end only sites! (the first 3 at least) or $5/mo for their smallest server with a backend. Easily worth it vs spending project time configuring infrastructure. I've only interacted with support once to ask for public IP ranges that my container could run on (I wanted to lock down access to my external DB cluster) and they weren't able to give me an answer. Not too worried about that.

name: Abhishek Jain
review_header: Most reliable servers at dirt cheapâ€¦
review_body: Most reliable servers at dirt cheap price.

name: jemoeder
review_body: When Centos decided to change route, Digital Ocean decided to not offer Almalinux and only RockyLinux, even when there are plenty of feature requests for this. They are forcing users to use operating systems they do not want. So for me it is goodbye DO. SUch a shame, so far they seemed pretty good.

name: Cirag Uday
review_header: Digital ocean service is good but whenâ€¦
review_body: Digital ocean service is good but when I create account it's always locked or many time it's successfully done with 3 droplate. But I thing Digital ocean hv some problam 1. If I need more droplate they never increase they give options for increase droplate but it's only For show off 2 support staff like MR. NAKUL, NAZIM ABBAS, EVAN, MUBASIRA, HARSHWARDN GOANTEY, SHER, POOJA, PRAVEEN, NAROVE ALL STAFF IS SHÃ¯t AND SMOKE WEED I SHARE MY EXPERIENCE WITH SUPPORT STAFF MAMBER. NAKUL I REQUEST FOR REMOVE PORT RESTRICTION BUT HE'S REPLY WE ARE NOT ABLE TO UNLOCK YOUR ACCOUNT AND MY ACCOUNT NOT LOCKED HE'S SMOKE WEED AND GIVE ME REPLY DIGITAL OCEAN SERIVES IS ONE OF THE BEST BUT PLEASE CHANGE YOU STUPID STAFF

name: FranÃ§ois
review_header: Digital Ocean does not respect theâ€¦
review_body: Digital Ocean does not respect the regulation concerning the billing system. Their support team is awfull, and they bill EU tax while i'm using a US company ! If you want to make your accounting happy, run away.

name: Csaba Todor
review_header: The Prices are not what they seems
review_body: I've rented a server/droplet for $5/month, and after a couple of months, I was paying much more than that without any prior notification... Greedy provider! Avoid them!

name: Somchai
review_header: cheap vps hosting for my blog

name: Jack Thorn
review_body: I got myself a cheap, $5 a month Droplet for hosting a Discord Bot. As I had $100 credit for a year (for free) due to GitHub Student Pack, I decided to experiment with this hosting provider, which didn't disappoint. It was easy to get my droplet purchased and connect to it via SSH, and then I could set up my bot to run on it!

name: Eric Griffiths
review_header: I have been using DO for about 4 yearsâ€¦
review_body: I have been using DO for about 4 years now, and host 93 websites across 67 servers. DO is a great host. When you see other reviewers that give a bad review, it is likely that they have no idea how to manage or set up a server. If you do not know what SSH is, DO is NOT the host for you. Some complain that DO is a scam, which it obviously is not, but If you can't keep track of your email and login/billing information, you should not be hosting anything anywhere. Yes of course you will need to log in to delete unused servers. Also, if you left a review here where your services were shut down and not offered a reason, you were doing something illegal for sure. Sorry that this is more of a review of the reviewers here, but this is ridiculous, DO deserves no less than a 4 or 5 star average. I am in no way affiliated with them, just a long time customer.

name: Ethan Bright
review_header: They offer better prices but need to be a web dev
review_body: They offer cheap price, but to use these products you need to have web development knowledge. If you are a newbie then don't try this. This is only for the experts/web devs.

name: Whmcs Licenses Lifetime Cheapes
review_body: They block the acount. Your account has been placed in a status where activation is no longer possible. Services are now unavailable and billing attempts will not occur. Nothing would be required to discontinue the account going forward and no additional actions from you are required. In order to maintain the integrity of our security systems, we cannot disclose which factors were identified that led to the decision on this account.

name: Imam Kurniansyah
review_header: Got robbed about 5$ after registering aâ€¦
review_body: Got robbed about 5$ after registering a new account. We can say, DigitalOcean is a scam!

name: William Nelson
review_header: Pricing too high, blogs are great though
review_body: Pricing too high, blogs are great though. Their blogs surrounding installing LEMP on a VPS, and setting up Redis to cache MySQL on PHP have been quite helpful and I appreciate that.

name: Tamara Riebel
review_body: Just don't expect any support. Our managed database was down for hours, we have opened a support ticket and after several hours the support was asking which browser we are using. We even provided them the detailed logs of our application, but their support is just not capable of doing anything. Avoid this company for anything serious. They don't provide any SLA for their services for a reason, they know they are bad but just don't want to improve.

name: Pierluigi Serra
review_body: Those people are simply not able to do their job. You submit a ticket and a random guy replies with a prepackaged answer but they not do anything to solve your issue.

name: Eoin O'Kennedy
review_header: Was a good customer for over 10 years
review_body: Was a good customer for over 10 years. Added an extra droplet and so my a/c balance started to drop faster. I hadn't checked in on my account balance and so they shut-off my account. Fair enough. When I realised my error I immediately paid my balance but they had deleted everything and there was no way to recover it. Shocked.

name: Matthew Kingsley
review_body: Waste of time. Signed up. Heard nothing back, despite adding $10 to my account. Then my account was 'closed' mysteriously. Support is slow. In the end it took 5 follow up emails to get my refund processed. I finally got a refund after 8 days. Now I understand why companies chose AWS, Azure etc over small operations like Digital Ocean who don't seem to be able to run a business properly - even one as simple as a hosting business.

name: Alexa Ale
review_header: I used digital ocean for a few monthsâ€¦
review_body: I used digital ocean for a few months and then gave up on them, forgetting to hang up, then woke up a few weeks later with my card blank. . .they took the money I needed, the money I borrowed from a friend up to my salary and I made 10 tickets and no one answered me. . .I don't want it anymore, I just want my money back for the services I didn't use. . .Please Edit: they refuse to give me my money back i want to write google,all people from here got scammed by theese guys,please shut down this scam site This is ticket number so give my money back ( Ticket number 06460852)

name: Vl
review_body: Registered to try out their services, but the newly created droplet didn't work. So i created a support ticket, and they told me i have to figure it out myself or hire some other company to look into it. Very bad customer support.

name: Yusuf Ozan
review_body: DigitalOcean is reliable and consistent. If you'd like to select security software and manage my own settings in more detail DigitalOcean is the way to go.

name: Monika Milchova
review_header: Has worked well well for a small VOIPâ€¦
review_body: Has worked well well for a small VOIP PBX.

name: Spiro Trango
review_header: THEY BROUGHT DOWN ALL MY WEBSITES OVERâ€¦
review_body: THEY BROUGHT DOWN ALL MY WEBSITES OVER A FALSE COPYRIGHT REQUEST I HAVE LOST THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS IN REVENUE MEANWHILE I HAD NO IDEA THEY TOOK MY SITES DOWN CUSTOMER SUPPORT HAVE NOT GOTTEN BACK TO ME. AVOID DIGITAL OCEAN AT ALL COSTS

name: Renzo Nicolas Dupont Laborda
review_body: I have opened 2 tickets to be able to get into my account and followed all requested steps, both have been closed by them without resolution. I no longer use Gmail with my domain and they are not able to grant me a simple password access so I can cancel what I had running. So my only option is to report them in my bank and hope they are blocked soon so they cannot charge me again. They have charged me the last 3 months for services I am not using because of this. Unwillines to help and incompetence, this is my experience with this company.

name: Jonah Marsden
review_body: I would given 0-stars if possible. Digital Ocean has to be one of the worse cloud providers available and I would as a seasoned developer of ten years at one of FANG can confidently say they are potentially fraudulent with their business practice. After having an account with them to test some functionality of a pet project they've randomly decided to lock my account for no valid reason, it's now day 5 of no customer support, I can only summarise they're in significant financial difficulty as they're are no support staff available for over 5 days. Do not use Digital Ocean if your infrastructure is mission critical as their internal support and customer support is actually worse than reseller hosting from some dodgy reseller. Edit: just been updated, DO have deemed a Laravel webservice with very low resource overheads a threat to platform security. Please avoid DO at all cost, as they are apparently according to their customer service unable to provide services. Edit: I have tried opening tickets and explaining the software I am running as well as linking the software's website and documentation. I believe the reason my account was marked as suspicious as the software opens multiple ports for each web service.

name: karsten Tarp
review_header: Every day I receive digital fraud fromâ€¦
review_body: Every day I receive digital fraud from them on bitcoin. They must be to stupid not sropping it! Sent them 100 of abuses!

name: Nic
review_body: Still good service. But support is VERY AWFUL! Digitalocean should be threated as self-managed service, in this case - I can give DO an excellent rating for CHEAP services.

name: RL
review_header: They suspended your account with allâ€¦
review_body: They suspended your account with all the droplets. But, unable to provide a valid reason. Mine was just a WP event site on nginx which they never re-enabled. Talk about it! Huge issues in clarity, I'd say. Do not use this service. Email: Hi there, We've deemed the activities on the account are in violation of the DigitalOcean user agreement, and your account has been locked and disabled as a result. In ten days, your account will be terminated and your data will be permanently deleted. If you feel it is an error, please reply to this email. Regards, Security Operations Center DigitalOcean

name: Sofus Mackie
review_body: Terrible company that scams innocent people. They deserve to be shut down!

name: PDFWORLD
review_body: 5 years -all ok

name: Haydrion Rayel
review_body: Amazing VPS hosting. Everything works. Never downtime

name: Rusty
review_body: Terrible experience SCAM! This service is a scam after i cancelled my billing i got charged a excess of 75+ pound for the next 2 months even though the vps was not a thing anymore due to me deactivating it horrible service dont buy!

name: Privat
review_header: Service not as discussed and sellerâ€¦
review_body: Service not as discussed and seller does not return paid money. Edit: Paypal returned the money after my escalation. Hands off this store!

name: mrfloki
review_header: same thing as many other people said
review_body: same thing as many other people said. scam

name: FayÃ§al Ould
review_header: one of the bad service in the worldâ€¦
review_body: one of the bad service in the world they banned me with no reason !!! and support say that it's confident and I can't get the reason !! not recommend at all

name: Customer
review_header: This company changed their console forâ€¦
review_body: This company changed their console for ssh, and it's been a nightmare since. Trying to get their support to fix ssh to get into my droplets has been a lost cause. I am an IT engineer with decades of experience. Their recovery console does not allow you to enter ssh commands like you would on putty. If you do, it keeps stating command not found. It is limited. Their support personnel will tell you that you are entering the commands wrong. Steer clear if you want to use this for production.

name: Francis Ashley
review_body: Account suspended for unstated reason - i.e. for no reason at all. I wish I'd read the reviews here before signing up - so many negative reviews about accounts being suspended suddenly and without warning. Digital Ocean is useless because behaving in this way makes it impossible to trust them. I would not recommend wasting time with this provider. It was a waste of time signing up and now I have to make sure they refund my payment.

name: Anonymous
review_body: I'm a professional system engineer since more than 20 years. I builded Cloud services myself, developt big API services myself and even worked with IBM Mainframes running AIX etc. 1. DO is totally overpriced since the first day. Sorry guy's but the performance is just bad for the price especially CPUs are totally overbooked. You aren't AWS so please don't try to act like a competitor, you're not. 2. In 2022 Cloud automation is nothing new nor special. Actually most features DO offer's I can do myself using Saltstack/Ansible. The funny thing to me is that DO still think's that they can charge people simply because they offer idiot like automation processes ... Don't get cheated here. 3. If I pay 40$ for a very basic VPS I expected more than 200 Mbps throughput, I also expect failover mechanism if a hypervisor fails (and DO does not, they have local SSD's), as to me this is also part of Cloud automation, it's not just a business model guy's. But yes sure it's expensive as everything has to be stored on shared network SAN system but this does not seem to match the vision of DO, at that price ... (Total fail to me... Did you guy's ever heard about Ceph? Just maybe) 4. The UI of DO is in many instances badly written JS code, not just that my developer console within Firefox goes mad with error messeages, no there are also loading issues no matter what browser I use. Sometimes it's working fine, sometimes not ... 5. Because of the pricing I would never choose DO for development or production, besides the missing support. I really can get the same reasources for a 5th of the price with the same features, why choose DO? Because of there animated shark mascot, Well I don't think so. Where is the argument for me as a customer? To me there is a lot of potential according to DO. On the other side DO is already running since years so I really don't think there will be much changes in the future, simply because DO is very process orientated company they've got stuck at a specific point ... Cheers

name: Development Cargo
review_header: Not so professional and doesnt care about customer data
review_body: Not so professional. They deleted all the data that we were working for the last 2 years and just say sorry we cannot do anything. The payment didnt go through and havent received any notification about it. They said they waited for 3 weeks and deleted all the data and they cannot restore or give the backup data. Most importantly, they do not have a call support which is super annoying to read and write long emails in the middle of the chaos they created. And they expect us to be polite and professional. Knowing how worst their support system is, I would not recommend Digital ocean to anyone. Though they mention they provide world class service at an affordable price, It definitely comes with a cost.

name: NikkieDev
review_body: I've read AMAZING tutorials for Linux Ubuntu hosting and LAMP servers. 10/10 would recommend

name: Ian Shaffer
review_header: DON'T DO BUSINESS WITH DO! READ THIS SUPPORT REQUEST--
review_body: (MY ACCOUNT IS LOCKED OUT THE INSTANT I ENTER MY CREDIT CARD INFO, THEN I RECEIVE THIS EMAIL) "Hello, Thank you for registering for a DigitalOcean account. Our automated security tooling identified patterns that suggest your account is not eligible for activation, which resulted in an account lock. After review by our support staff, we have determined that restoring access to your account will not be possible. If you feel your account was locked in error you can take action! Please provide us with additional information about how you plan to use our platform including potential resource requirements. Additionally, if you recently opened multiple new accounts with us, could you please clarify why you have created an additional account rather than use our Teams feature? To learn about Team Accounts, please see here: 'DOURLHERE/docs/accounts/teams/' DigitalOcean Teams | DigitalOcean Documentation Share access to DigitalOcean resources with multiple users without sharing login credentials or billing information. 'DOURLHERE' A note on potential account charges: When you add a credit card to a new DigitalOcean account, we may send a preauthorization request to the issuing bank. This is to verify that the card being added has been issued by the bank and that they will authorize the charges. This temporary preauthorization hold ranges from USD $1 to $15. The hold may appear on your statement for up to 7 days, but no funds are being transferred from your card or account to DigitalOcean. You will see those amounts reflect in the coming week, probably sooner. Inquiries about the hold should be made directly with your bank. Any PayPal payments initiated on sign up have been refunded and will post as soon as it clears via PayPalâ€™s automated network. You can contact PayPal directly about the status of the refund. DigitalOcean Support Team" (NEXT I OPEN A SUPPORT REQUEST): " My account is locked out in error. I did not know about your teams feature. I simply was attempting to go to your website and open an account. At first I was thinking about using my google ID, but I would prefer to utilize my business account. I am trying to set this up so I can get my web developer in and setup my Web presence which will be 3 sites, one for 3D printing and vlogging, and two others that will be surrounding real estate and vlogging development. Please unlock the account. Is there other information that you would require for me to provide?" (DO RESPONSE 1): "Hey there! Thank you for following up in regards to the lock on your account. Our security tooling identified patterns that suggest your account is not eligible for re-activation. To be sure, I just conducted a manual review of your account and have confirmed that we are unable to override this decision. I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused by this. Additionally, please note that we're unable to share details regarding what led to this decision as this is critical to maintaining our security systems. Due to the nature of the violation that has occurred we won't be able to issue any refunds in this situation. You can review our terms of service here: 'DOURLHERE/legal/terms-of-service-agreement/' Legal - Terms of Service Agreement - DigitalOcean Helping millions of developers easily build, test, manage, and scale applications of any size â€“ faster than ever before. Any new accounts created will be subject to the same security reviews. We thank you for understanding and wish you luck in your future hosting endeavors. Warm Regards, Evan Developer Experience Specialist DigitalOcean Support ref:_00Df218t5m._5004P1kn9RS:ref" (MY REPLY) "Please explain to me what am I supposed to do to get an account with Digital Ocean. Are you honestly telling me that you donâ€™t want my business?" (THEIR FOLLOW UP) "Hello there, We have reviewed this ticket extensively and are unable to accommodate this request. To maintain the integrity of our security systems, we cannot disclose which factors were identified that led to the decision on this account. We appreciate your understanding. Regards, Dheeraj, Digital Ocean, Developer Experience Specialist. ref:_00Df218t5m._5004P1kn9RS:ref" (MY FOLLOW UP TO THIS) "Since I donâ€™t have access to do this myself, Remove my account immediately and send me confirmation of account deletion." (DO RESPONSE) " " absolutely nothing. Crickets. I'm going to need to cancel my CC and treat this company as a fraud. Take from this review what you will. (NEW UPDATE 4:07PM EST - GIST OF RESPONSE FROM DO) 'Thank you we're closing this request. Contact privacy if you'd like'

name: Moritz Sattler
review_header: Do not host production systems on DO
review_body: I host my app on managed Kubernetes on digital ocean. One day I realise I have a bug. No problem I think, lets just login to DO and I will take care of it. Upon login, it tells me they send me an email with 6 digits I need to enter. I check my Gmail - nothing. I make double sure that it's not in spam or anywhere where I could have missed it. I even checked if I receive emails correctly. But it seems like DO's email system is buggy. Since my production system is down, and this is quite urgent, I write DO support. And I, a paying customer, get no reaction. I wrote them a couple more messages and opened a few more tickets, but they're not reacting. My production system has been down for more than 24h now, and DO is absolutely unreachable. I posted to their community forum, just to be told that the forum/moderators there will not be able to assist me. The bottom line is, if you have a critical system, host it elsewhere, as the DO is buggy, and may lock you out, and their customer support is almost non-existent.

name: Raymond Reggers
review_header: Worst experience with a company, EVER.
review_body: I wanted to try out kubernetes on DO for a machine learning project. I liked the clear cost indication and the 100$ trial seemed great. I actually wouldn't have mind to start without this "gift" because of the simple ux. However, this turned out to be my worst experience with a company, EVER. After 1 day of running a workload on 10 vm's, my account got locked. I responded to the support ticket, offering them to look at what i was planning to use the DO for. I got a reply stating that my account was permanently locked by their automated system and they couldn't change that. Meanwhile my 10 machines are still running (150 hours). And i can't stop them because my account is locked. Nor can i delete my account, or remove my credit card. Because I was worried they would keep these machines running. Now at the time of writing my machines are still running (1500) hours, and my credit card will be billed. In follow up mails they stated "Services are now unavailable and billing attempts will not occur." However just now I received a notice "This is a notice that your usage costs this month have exceeded the credit balance on your account. Your card on file will be charged at the end of the month for any remaining balance." So long story short, you sign up for a free trial. They lock your account, keep costs increasing, their support states you won't be billed. But at the end of the day you'll be charged. FYI I blocked DO from my credit card. And with this experience I hope any new customer won't ever consider using DO as a trustworthy partner. I'm now using GKE and google can happily charge my creditcard. Tip for DO: Stop with the 100$ credit, because the way you are handling serious new customers is a joke. I would't have mind paying right from the start, because I liked the clear UX and cost forecast. My feeling is that DO's vm's are cheaper because their vm's use a lot of shared resources. My use case of running ML workloads which 100% utilise cpu's are not desired for them. Avoid them at all costs.

name: PAM
review_body: DigitalOcean is great, no complains at all. Sure every company has some hiccups / downtime but it's minimal on DO. It is a "self" managed cloud hosting, not for beginners!

name: Simple Source ERP
review_header: Just like the rest of the users here
review_body: Just like the rest of the users here, Signed up - got dinged for a few bucks for pre auth on the card and then they locked my account. I am shocked that this business can operate like this and get a way with it. Went with another provider. UPDATE 12/15/2021 I opened a ticket THAT day which has still yet to be answered. I find the only reply on TrustPilot. It is not the way to treat customers. In my business we treat our customers with respect and make sure they get what they pay for and beyond. You guys have made a living on "fund verification" process and flat our theft. Shocked a class action suit has not not already happened but not shocked to see that one is in progress. Please feel free to disregard this message and myself. I have no intentions on ever doing business with your group and I will make certain that anyone who i come in contact with is made aware of this scam of business you guys are running. Sorry to be so harsh, but you guys are blatant thieves.

name: Cate Q
review_header: I'm not sure why I see so many badâ€¦
review_body: I'm not sure why I see so many bad reviews here. I love Digital Ocean for how simple it is. The documentation is always up to date, and for the price, I don't see how anyone can complain. I have a bunch of $5 droplets to automate simple tasks, and I run a wordpress install on a 10$ droplet with no issues, serving about 50k unique page views a month. I was using Kinsta before and had a nightmare in comparison, for 3x the cost.

name: Trevrosa
review_header: Support is very quick in responding toâ€¦
review_body: Support is very quick in responding to my tickets, and the service has always been reliable

name: Nigel Norris
review_header: Does this company have a death wish?
review_body: They clearly don't like potential new customers. Like many others I had the 'register and get locked out' sequence. Hey, guys, just maybe there's a problem with your sign-up process?? After interacting with the support process, which clearly doesn't involve humans at all, I finally got the account unlocked. Now they want me to pay them money again to verify my identity even though I've already done it once on that account. Forget it. I've registered and got a site up and running on Vercel in the time it took for one support exchange on DigitalOcean. One more customer lost.

name: Chris Harris
review_body: Cheap, but you get what you pay for. The servers were affordable and fast to spin up, that was great. Their customer support doesn't have a phone line, and takes days to respond, so don't count on any assistance. Even when you do reach them, they are not helpful. I had been paying for backups and then those backups were not available. Instead of either working to provide my backups to me or provide me a refund for the payment to the backups, I was told they could provide me with neither. I won't be using digitalocean going forward and would not recommend them to other developers. I lost months of work and thousands in development cost due to them losing my backups.

name: Î Î±Î½Î±Î³Î¹ÏŽÏ„Î·Ï‚ ÎšÏ‰Î½ÏƒÏ„Î±Î½Ï„Î¯Î½Î¿Ï…
review_header: I use DO for a long time now and I love it.
review_body: I use DO for a long time now. What I love is the simplicity of doings things. A friendly UI/UX and their fantastic documentation. I truly search for digitalocean +problem whenever have a linux problem :-) Beyond that I think they have the best prices. It is so easy and fast to create a droplet that I dont care to do experiments and have everything go wrong. For me, they have overall a decent solution, with an easy UI/UX and a great documentation. Speed is also good. The only negative I found is that they do not have data center in Greece or Italy. Hope they manage to create something there too.

name: Kevin August
review_header: Highly recommended for devs / server administrators.
review_body: As an SEO and server admin, I highly recommend this platform for the amazing up-time and ease of use when it comes to the control panel. Nothing overly complicated as long as you know your way around the command line as most experienced dev's do. Pricing is far better than hosts like WPEngine where your hosting is managed by their staff, but costs about double what you pay if you learn to administrate your own instances (droplets). Highly recommend this platform for experienced users. Very surprised to see so many negative reviews but most seem to have to do with security / fraud lockouts for international customers - which I do understand as DO does a great job keeping bad sites / nefarious actors off their platform.

name: LT
review_body: We've been using DO since 2013 and are pretty happy with the experience. The only feature lacking is ability to download droplets/snapshots to a local machine. Otherwise, all is good.

name: Rahmat Ullah
review_body: The account got instantly locked after paying. and they won't provide a valid reason why they did it. Use case: I need a permanent VPS

name: Nick Lansley
review_body: I've been using DigitalOcean for years and love it. The thing people need to realise is that DigitalOcean is a "developers cloud provider" - that is, you must have the knowledge to look after your droplets, keep them patched and updated using apt as if they were on premises. It is up to you to set up the (excellent) firewall and load balancers via the web interface or 'doctl' command line program. As a Dev, the performance and resilience of 'my' droplets and applications is down to me, and I love this level of freedom and control over my environment.

name: colm o'brien
review_body: Easy to use and cheap. Why all the neg reviews I just don't understand. Not saying they haven't had issues but for us it's been a smooth ride

name: Jan
review_header: Don't understand why so many negativeâ€¦
review_body: Don't understand why so many negative reviews about DigitalOcean. Service is very good but not for newbies!

name: Andrew Nelson
review_body: Brutally slow customer service. My NodeJS server has gone down 6+ times in 2 days with no help whatsoever. Pretty unimpressed.

name: bastajohn
review_body: Extremely satisfied with the $100 free credit. The servers are powerful.

name: Sam Segal
review_header: My experience with deploying a POC webâ€¦
review_body: My experience with deploying a POC web app to demonstrate the use of Docker and Docker Swarm for container orchestration was super easy compared to other Platforms. Very straightforward user interface. The price was nice. 5 star's for sure!!

name: Abhishek Deshpande
review_body: Virtual Servers that are both attractive and fast. The only disadvantage is that the majority of IP addresses have been used for spam at some point in the past.

name: Sardor YSF
review_header: I really had my problem solved
review_body: I really had my problem solved Thank you for the Support assistance by Umer Totally recommended Hope they keep it up

name: John Fricker
review_header: Why do you have to enter your payment information just to see how much things might cost?
review_body: I've been trying to evaluate which service can provide the cheapest Kubernetes cluster for me to use for a hobby project. AWS, GCP, and Azure all provide quite transparent pricing. That is to say: they have pricing calculators and you can look up the prices for CPU, memory, etc. In contrast, Digital Ocean is very opaque when it comes to pricing. Their advertising says you can get a Kubernetes cluster "from $10" but doesn't go into details. Their pricing calculator deals only with Droplets (not sure what these are - I'm assuming it's like Google Cloud Run), not clusters. Their pricing page doesn't provide any more insight either. So, I did the next logical thing: open an account and hope that I can see the prices once I'm registered. What I didn't expect was to be greeted with a request to verify my identity by providing my payment details. Why, when we live in a world where major companies have had data breaches and leaked PII, must I provide my payment information just to try and find out how much a service costs? I could understand if I was trying to use one of their services, but I wasn't. I was just trying to evaluate their pricing. I contacted them via Twitter (the "contact sales" page button just went to "please wait" but never did anything and I found out via the Chrome debugger that the page had errored because of broken code) and all they did was tell me to file a support ticket. I did so and I'm now waiting for a reply, but given my experience I don't think I'll be choosing DO even if they turn out to be the cheapest option. Edit: DO support have come back to say that it's not possible to sign up without adding a payment method, so given their lack of transparency on pricing I'm going to give them a miss.

name: Adam Recovery
review_body: fast and cheap servers, only positive review

name: Sergey Karakhanyan
review_header: I don't understand the bad rates ...
review_body: I don't understand the bad rates about this product. It's cheap. Easy to set up without any DevOps knowledge. Scalable. Easy to maintain. Using it already for years. 5 stars from me.

name: Rainer
review_header: Don't trust them with production projects
review_body: They don't have bare metal servers. So don't even try to trust them with serious projects since they will terminate your account sooner or later.

name: David Shepherd
review_body: I used DO in my previous job for years. We had a fairly simple bunch of systems (mostly just VMs) but things always worked fine and they were cheap. I particularly like that their ui is much easier to use than AWS or Google cloud.

name: Daft Punk
review_body: Using Digital Ocean services for about 6 years, I have no problems at all. Great service!

name: Zachary Bellay
review_header: I run 2 small websites on DO VPS's andâ€¦
review_body: I run 2 small websites on DO VPS's and use their S3 offering (DO Spaces). I have never had any problems with DO. Their pricing is straightforward, their UI is intuitive, their services work great, and the customer service interactions I have had have been very polite, timely, and helpful. Not sure why there is so much hate, I love DO!

name: TheGreatPatsy
review_body: My ISPs spam filter works quite well, but there are between 1-3 spams that get through each day, and all originate from DigitalOcean's servers. The company has a reputation for not doing anything about this and seems to be happy to provide spammers with servers and changing IP addresses. As a potential client I will never support such a company. Update: I did file a ticket as requested and I sent them headers of some spam mails I have received from their servers. About a week later I received the email below which I interpret in the way that they have no interest in catching spammers using their servers. N.B.: the spammers are paying customers. I am happy to supply Digitalocean with some spam received (which I already did) but not my physical signature, all my personal information and statements under the penalty of perjury. All this is not needed to identify spammers that use their systems. I mean, really??? Their reaction just shows that this is a company to stay away from. Anyway, here is the last response from them after I have sent them the requested spam samples: Thank you for your report. We have reviewed the details and noticed that the required information for a complete, valid report is missing. In order for us to action your report, you must include some specific information, including: A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of allegedly infringed. Identification of the material you believe is spam. This should include the URL where such material may be found (if one exists), and any other information (including IP address) that will enable us to locate that material. Your contact information, including address, telephone number, and e-mail address. A statement that you have a good faith belief that the material is not authorized by the owner, its agent, or the law. A statement made under penalty of perjury that the information provided is accurate and that the notifying party is authorized to make the complaint on behalf of the owner Once we have the completed notice, we will forward it to the appropriate party. Alternately, you can utilize our form at [link removed] (be sure to select Spam) which will easily outline what information we would need, then automatically submit it to us for processing.

review_body: absolute joke of a company. requested a payment extension as i just got a new job, which means that my date of being paid has changed from the previous one - refused it and then have the audacity to say "we are hopeful that you can find another solution to solve your financial difficulty" will never be using this company again, and would advise others to do the same

review_body: Signed up and was instantly banned/locked by their garbage AI system. Started a ticket and they told me to pound sand saying I could NOT be a client, all in under 90 seconds.

name: Ian
review_body: I've only used their spaces feature so far but seems good. Very fast and nice simple pricing plans compared to the likes of Amazon, from whom I moved from. Cheers

name: Brian
review_header: One of the best cloud providers
review_body: I got a $100 credit from GitHub student developer pack and decided to try DigitalOcean. Pricing: DO's prices are similar to Vultr and Linode. They offer affordable and transparent pricing, unlike AWS EC2. Support: Great support team. Ticket was resolved in less than 40 minutes. Security: TOTP. No FIDO2 support yet. Hopefully, they'll implement it in the future. Misc: Nice, clean UI/UX. Easy to use. Easy to understand docs. Free IPv4 and IPv6 addresses. Droplets deployed in seconds. NVME storage. They also support free and open-source software contributors by hosting Hacktoberfest. Got a free shirt and stickers from Hacktoberfest 2020. I never had negative experiences. For me, DigitalOcean is one of the best cloud providers.

name: TAAG Ltd
review_body: Poor service and bad way to handle any issue you may encounter. We stopped with them.

name: Hanif Saqib
review_header: Scam digital ocean, please don't use it
review_body: After creating account, I pay 5$ via PayPal, but after payment that blocked my account without any reason. And also they didn't refund my 5$. Please don't use digital ocean service, instead of it the vultr is hundred time better then it. I'm personally use now after digital ocean account blocking. Ticket #5001381

name: Mohammad
review_header: Support does not help for any dropletsâ€¦
review_body: Support does not help for any droplets problems saying that they do not have access to it.

name: Bradley Stiles
review_header: Unbelievable I canâ€™t pay the invoice!
review_body: Unbelievable I canâ€™t pay the invoice! I can see it but I canâ€™t pay it!! No link to payment gateway nothing!! I have told my developer if they dare put another application with this company I will sack them

name: Thomas Williams
review_header: Digital Ocean block outbound port 25 onâ€¦
review_body: Digital Ocean block outbound port 25 on IPv6. This is a different restriction from the one where some new customers canâ€™t connect to port 25 at all - support advised me I wasnâ€™t subject to this new customer restriction anyway but even if customers manage to get this new customer restriction lifted, they only unblock it on IPv4. The IPv6 restriction is at network level not account level and thereâ€™s no way to remove this block. Itâ€™s permanent and applies to all customers. It seems like a strange policy to me - I completely get you may want to do extra diligence on new customers to prevent abuse before letting them use SMTP, but you allowed connections over IPv4 without issue in my case but not IPv6 which seems like a significantly lesser risk? Iâ€™m not sure what risk youâ€™re mitigating by allowing traffic over one protocol but not the other, especially as IPv6 isnâ€™t as widely used. Unfortunately, when I raised this issue with support and presented evidence of the blocks, they insisted they donâ€™t do any such blocks. It took 4 responses for them to finally admit they have this policy - all the while my server is racking up charges. The policy seems silly in my eyes anyway, but if you insist on having it, I expect your staff to be aware of it (but also be open minded enough to challenge their knowledge when presented with pretty firm evidence rather than ignoring it).

name: Blue Box Elephant
review_body: They deleted my server, my data base, my business without telling me because there was a balance of 24 usd!!! After 5 years being with them! By the way no need to send your reply template. Check at other bad reviews something is obviously not right with you guys and I am currently reviewing my case with my lawyer for the damage your company created by just destroying my 5 years business for a miss payment of 24 usd!!! Shame on you!

name: Peter
review_body: Most ð•¤ð•™ð•šð•¥ company ever. Offering 100$ if you add 5$ but i never recieved the 100$. They don't offer refunds so i cant even refund my money. Next thing is that i can't even log into my ubuntu server because their console is laggy and it dont take the password or ssh key so i cant even log in. They have terrible plans: 20$ a month for 4gb ram HAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAH

name: Paddy Gibbins
review_body: I have used DO for various projects in the past and cannot fault them - reliable service and all the controls needed for managing servers, if needed to scale up/down or restart from the web console.

name: saqib ali
review_header: My worst expreince with Digital Ocean
review_body: My worst expreince with Digital Ocean, I'm using digital ocean since 1 year, but recently they blocked my account without any reason, So however I lost my all bussiness due to his worst service. and also they don't replay. Please be careful don't use the digital ocean service. and also they block initially account payments.

name: Marco
review_header: DigitalOcean has a serious problem withâ€¦
review_body: DigitalOcean has a serious problem with its system login. The first time I tried to get back one of my old accounts, but it was impossible as I am not receiving any password in the email when I try to reset it. I filled in the contact form for the support but what I had in the replay was 5 exact automatic response but not answer. The second time, I created an account on Digital Ocean and successfully access it after few days says that the email is not recognized anymore. Again, I try to reset the password but I do not get any email from DigitalOcean. I filled out the contact form again (after I paid 5 euro) and I got this back: 'We know how frustrating it can be to get locked out of your accounts. If you can't regain access to the email account you use to log into DigitalOcean, we can change your sign-in email address. We need to know the new email address you want to use and, to maintain the security of your account and its resources, we also need some information to verify that you are the account owner. Please reply to this email with all five parts of the following identity verification information: The new email address you want to use. You cannot use an address that is already used on another DigitalOcean account. Information about the payment method on the account. If you paid with a credit card, please include: * The name on the card * The type of card (like Visa or MasterCard) * The last four digits of the card number * The card's expiration date If you paid with PayPal, please provide the PayPal account email address. The date and amount (in USD) of the last billing transaction by DigitalOcean. If you paid with PayPal, please also provide the PayPal transaction ID. A photo of the payment owner's government-issued ID, such as a passport, driver's license, or military ID. A photo of the payment owner holding their government-issued ID by the side of their face. What is wrong with you DigitalOcean!!!!???

name: Manuel
review_header: Provided account for spammers, yet changed!
review_body: Provides account for spammers and seem not to care (forwarded spam mail to the abuse adress and the company is not responsive on Twitter on this topic). Edit: Abuse-mail does not respond, but their contact form seem to work and they may be doing something there. @DigitalOcean: my ticket numbers so far are: 04932444, 04932450, 04932453, 04943009 Edit 2023-06-18: DigitalOcean was quite responsive in the last years, which lead to almost no spam anymore from their servers. I respect that and changed my rating here!

name: customer

review_body: Charged me Â£5 to set my account up to make sure I am real, then won't let me set up a server for $40 a month. You just stole my Â£5 can I have it back please. I won't be using this toxic cancer website. SHOCKING

name: Há»£p DÆ°Æ¡ng Tuáº¥n
review_body: Scammers, deleted my drops with no prior notice given. Extremely bad support service, took up to 1 day to be answered. Should not be used.

name: Logan Schmitt
review_body: Opened a new account to test their service while our company looks for hosting providers. The account was created, and immediately blocked for "security" reasons. I opened a ticket as requested in the email response to explain why I was opening an account. Supposed they manually reviewed my account and still said that they cannot offer us service. We are a small business that resides in the USA, with fortune 500 clientele. What type of "security" check did you do on my account that would prohibit us from purchasing services? What am absolute terrible way to go about business. Btw, they will gladly take your credit card information, charge your account, and refuse to delete this information after requesting they do so after locking your account. I've been working in IT infrastructure for years and have never once been denied to purchase provided services, not a single time. All I have to say is do not waste your time. This has to be a scam and if my credit card ends up being charged again we will be speaking to our lawyers. Fwiw, they gave no indication as to why we are being denied except for this response: "Hi there, Thank you for following up in regards to the lock on your account. Our automated security tooling identified patterns that suggest your account is not eligible for activation. To be sure, I just conducted a manual review of your account and have confirmed that we are unable to override this decision. I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused by this. Additionally, please note that weâ€™re unable to share details regarding what led to this decision as this is critical to maintaining our security systems."

name: hyper
review_body: Very fast and functional and I haven't ran into any of the issues people have been describing so far.

name: Rob
review_header: Billing me for no reason and can't cancel
review_body: Billing me, haven't used their service, can't login!!! My details are correct, its been said it's a problem with their system. Very bad customer experience.

name: Nik
review_body: excellent cloud provider! their NVME servers are very fast. I used their storage services and cloud servers and I'm very happy with them.

name: HernÃ¡n
review_body: I have been a happy customer of Digital Ocean for the last 5 years and never had an issue with them. I moved in from a typical shared hosting because they used to have many restrictions, and, in the end, the entry price was similar. Being a VPS, the setup wasn't easy at that time, but I managed to create a solid server that never let me down, and I have done customizations that I would never have been able to do in a shared hosting. I find that Digital Ocean is somewhere between a typical hosting and AWS: not as hard to use as AWS, but with many tools that make management easier and a good price for the value.

name: Simon
review_body: Appalling customer service. Deleted my droplet over a late payment of $7. This despite me trying to set up a card payment with them. I did receive an email saying my droplet was "at risk of being deleted" (their exact works) - but they deleted it regardless of the warning. Real shame but speaks volumes about what this think of customers.

name: Tom Tolkien
review_header: Digital Ocean refused to cancel my account and delete my personal information. Avoid Digital Ocean!
review_body: I tried Digital Ocean for 20 days, but there were several platform bugs that support did not resolve, and the product - Digital Ocean Spaces - was not fit for purpose. When I tried to cancel my account, cancel my billing and delete my personal information, yet more bugs on the Digital Ocean platform prevented me from being able to delete my account. I provided a video of the bugs on their platform via loom to Digital Ocean support, who ignored my support ticket and did not respond. I also got in touch with Digital Ocean on Twitter, who refused to help. This company appears to be a scam. It would appear that, in preventing and refusing to delete accounts, billing, and personal information when requested, Digital Ocean would appear to be trying to ensure that billing is continued even if the product is not being used and the customer has specifically requested termination of the account. If Digital Ocean refuses to cancel a customer account when requested, this amounts to fraud. Furthermore, in refusing to delete billing and personal information when requested, Digital Ocean is in breach of all US, UK and EU data protection laws. Avoid this company!

name: Jave Computers
review_body: I have a digital ocean VPS through scalahosting. I regret choosing Digital Ocean. No remarks at server speeds, but impossible to use server email because their IP's ranges are blacklisted! Worthless!

name: O Shener
review_header: They deleted my 8 years old VMâ€¦
review_body: They deleted my 8 years old VM (Website) without any notification due to 5 weeks late payment. Only the web site was showing warning. A deletion process must follow a series of notificiation with different channels. Shame , after 95 months its deleted for 1 month delay, during the pandemic, without knowing my situation.

In my case, i started using digital ocean 2 days ago for testing the behaviour of a Social Media App at the network level. I created 9 droplets with same code but different scenarios. This just last 1 day and for some reason I dont understand they just blocked the account so I lost important logging data. Of course I will start again but on another service... i dont understand why they just block you, why dont they reach you to talk about what you are doing... this is crazy .. totally unprofessional.

review_body: Horrible Support I got a DMCA notice which I responded to in less than 24 hours with proof that it was a misunderstanding and that I have not violated any law. To be safe I even removed the post from my website while I was waiting for the outcome of the case. Waited 2 weeks with no response then I receive an email saying my website has been taken down because I didn't respond. I forwarded my previous email in response and opened another ticket with all the information I had provided previously and still no one got back to me.

review_body: Hey I got two mail from digital ocean regarding trademark issue of one keyword. Both the emails were about same keyword but they created duplicate ticket. I removed them from my database as it was user generated subdomain. I replied to one of those email stating that it is removed. I got a response that matter is now resolved. But suddenly they sent another email & suspended my droplet. My application was up & running. I have paid customers using application for critical business operations. I am getting harassment calls from my customers for refunds. Will you guys pay for my loss as it's clearly your mistakes?? I created tickets but no response. It's been 48 hours my site is down. U wrote Twitter about my problem. They reply on Twitter & pretend to be nice but to response on tickets. They might even write their typical response " create a ticket & they won't ever respond to ticket " Such poor service DigitalOceam ðŸ’© Regards Frustrated Paid DigitalOcean User

name: Kevin Cantrell
review_body: This company is horrible. They have absolutely NO SUPPORT what-so-ever. Everything is canned responses that are auto generated. I have been locked out of my account for almost two weeks. I can't get back in but they are no how to charge my card every month. THEY SUCK!!!! No support number and no call backs. This seems to be the common trend with programmers who create products but have no desire to support them and then call themselves professionals. This is response they sent is the very issue. I actually opened a ticket over a month ago and got no response and because the login issue is still there, it won't let me open a ticket nor do they give you anyone to speak with or email. Your company is crap and a sham. Your support is non-existant. I will be stopping payment through my bank. You suck and your response is proof and I am not the only person who has had this exact problem. WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME BUT YOU SURE GOT PAID! So it gets better I sent a contact message because I couldn't send a ticket without logging in which was the issue from the start. I even stated that in the contact form. Their response login disable the account. What a group of clowns.

name: Dmitri E
review_body: First line of support seems to know nothing about software development, they give stupid advices and don't understand obvious bugs. After some 3-5 emails with them they say that they pass your request to the engineering team, who only once out of 8 times admitted the problem on their side. Usual response is - we looked at the charts and everything is fine on our side. I never managed to get my request passed to people, who actually check something beyond the performance charts assuming that they might have a bug in their system. So support is non-existent. If something doesn't work, don't expect it to be fixed. When you write to support, then be prepared to prove that you are not an idiot first with 3-5 emails.

name: Jack Miller
review_header: Any new accounts created will beâ€¦
review_body: Any new accounts created will be subject to the same security reviews. blocked blocked don't use digitalocean no one care about customers
