review_header: Account locked after submitting CC details
review_body: I tried signing up for DigitalOcean and right after submitting my credit card details I got a message saying "we are sorry to inform you that your account has been locked by DigitalOcean". I NEVER had that happen anywhere else. I'm starting to think this company is a SCAM to steal your personal and financial information!

name: ESSA GHAZWANI
review_header: please dont use this service they willâ€¦
review_body: please dont use this service they will charge your visa anytime for nothing. top scam website

name: Viktor Viktor
review_body: Automatically locked my account right after i registered and verified my credit card. Actually, it is the first time in my life i see something like this ! Don't waste your time with this company !

name: Heine
review_header: Heavy spammer, but at least helpfull
review_body: First of all, I'm not a customer at DigitalOcean, however I have an equally bad experience with DO as many of the other reviews here, let me explain: I run a small family/business mail and webserver and as many others we receive a fair deal of spam/unsolicited mails, some days more than other and SpamAssassin usually takes care of the problem. Out of curiosity I tried loading the first 100 domain names from the spam folder to infobyip, a website that provides bulk lookup of up to 100 domain names/IP addresses. To my surprise, 95 of these 100 domains originated from DO's ASN #14061. I can see other reviews complaining that they block SMTP traffic, in that case it is quite strange that their system is so heavily overrepresented in my spam filter. Looking around the web I can see I'm not the only one getting attacked from DO servers, so for now the solution is to block the complete ASN #14061. That instantly removed 95% of the workload on my mail/spam fighting system (Postfix/SpamAssassin) I know this will also block legit users of DO, but I can only recommend them to switch to a more serious provider. Reply to answer: I have got some help regarding the spam, but not as stated in answer since i'm not a customer at DigitalOcean. For now I have raised my rating to 2 stars for at least trying to do something (and for a lot of usefull guides regarding fighting spam, even if a bit of irony is involved, considered the percentage of spam originating from DO themselves...)

name: Zintarplex
review_header: Support (which used to be great) is notâ€¦
review_body: Support (which used to be great) is now a robot trying to guess what you are saying and not helping at all.

name: Omar
review_header: Locked account right after paying $5/mo for it!
review_body: I have recently found this review board while I was Googling for "DigitalOcean Sucks", and I have a story about DigitalOcean antics that I want to share. Last summer I needed a VPS for a personal project, I wanted to try first the service before getting their premium plan, right after I signed up for the basic $5/mo plan, they locked my account...what? Sent a ticked the same day (it was June 30), they answered me only on Aug 27! I got a canned answer about their internal tools caught patterns associated with fraudulent behaviour. How this was even possible I don't know, since I didn't even had the chance to do literally anything. As of today, my account is still locked and I cannot even access the setting or remove my personal and payment information. I opened a ticket asking that they remove my personal and payment information and close/delete the account. Guess what? I never had any answer they just keep my personal data as an hostage, how is this even legal? And look at the cookie cutter answers they provide, someone from the marketing department, just go around the board here and there and copy and paste the same answers to reviewers, taking laziness to the next level. Worst service ever, stay away from those clowns, I would not go back to DO even if "they" pay me. I want my payment and private information removed and at Do nobody seems to care, they seems to lack motivation, so I will file a privacy complaint with the Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada explaining the situation, maybe that can fix it. ===================================== UPDATE As expected, they answered to this post "like they did for other post as well" with the usual copy&paste answer. Oh yeah, your security systems are doing such a "great" job lol, are you for real? Opening a ticket, again? Are you kidding me? I opened a ticket and you waited 2 months to answer, just to reply with a nonsensical canned answer sent by a bot! I recently opened a new ticket asking you to delete my account, still no answer, you are such liars and bullshitters and your support sucks so bad, I swear, I have never experienced something that bad, you literally have no support at all, you just use bot to automate your tickets answers. Paradoxically, you are very quick to answer on this board than on your ticketing service, your business practice and customers service don't make any sense whatsoever. Digital Ocean is still holding my personal and payment information, the account was not deleted as requested. This is very shady, unethical, and probably illegal. I don't even care anymore. FU Digital Ocean.

name: Developer
review_body: EDIT 04.03.2021 after their reply: ticket number was #04471971, I deleted my account since I am not planning to make use of your services at any point in the future. Opened an account and it got locked. Support does not exist, they only reply with automated responses. I told them I request deletion of my account after they failed to understand English but they still use the automatic reply "Your account was found to match patterns associated with fraudulent behavior, which is a violation of our Terms of Service. After review, we have determined that restoring access to your account is not possible." (I sent them all possible proof and I bet they did not even look over it). I am going to submit a GDPR complaint. Steer away from these shameless scammers! Vultr has more performant VPS's and they do not lock accounts at random.

name: Ryan W
review_header: I was reading some of the bad reviewsâ€¦
review_body: I was reading some of the bad reviews like someone complaining about port 25 being blocked. If you know anything about Email, you know port 25 and 110 must always be blocked so you can use SSL. Port 25 is extremely vulnerable. Anyway, I have used DO for over a year and love the speed, flexibility and support. I have hosted my Wordpress on many platforms and DO gives me the best performance. Before you complain, if you don't fully know how to manage your own Linux server, go to a cheap shared hosting platform or get someone with more experience to help you. The port 25 complaint is just mind blowing.

name: T B
review_body: After wasting an entire day's worth of work, I finally found out that my PHP mail() script wasn't working because DigitalOcean have blocked Port 25, meaning all mail services are restricted. I made a support ticket explaining how I'm only hosting a small company website that would use an email contact form for customers. Being a very small local company it would use < 100 emails per year - not even close to spam. They replied quickly (most likely an automated response) telling me they will not unblock Port 25 and suggested me to pay for additional mail services from other websites! No doubt these websites are paying DigitalOcean for this referral and to block mail services in order to encourage users to do so. Very disappointed and will be moving to a different VPS service that has Port 25 open.

name: Diamond Huang
review_header: Account locked after gave $5 to DO
review_body: after gave $5 to DO, I got this message: "We are sorry to inform you that your account has been locked by DigitalOcean.", i asked them why, they told me that my account " was found to match patterns associated with fraudulent behavior". funny, I used my email and paypal account sign up at google cloud, AWS, IBM, Vultr, never got any problem. just wanna to try DO when i found their ad in gmail, and slap on my face.

name: Jack P.
review_body: I see quite a few negative reviews on here for DigitalOcean, but I've never experienced many of the issues people raise. There was a time when customer support took days to answer a few years ago, but I never have to wait more than a few hours these days. In addition, all through this pandemic DO support have been exceptionally helpful, even when my business couldn't pay bills for up to 3 months at a time. They've given me extension after extension, and when I miss the cut off and my servers get suspended they have them back up and running even with a partial payment. I acknowledge that DO IP addresses are blacklisted on many databases for spam and malware, and that definitely needs to be addressed, but for email that can be rectified by using DMARC and other security mechanisms. Overall, I've been a happy customer for many years.

name: paul
review_header: I will not recommend using this companyâ€¦
review_body: I will not recommend using this company as a hosting server. They do not care about you as a user/client. What they care about is the money that you pay that include nothing more than maintain their servers and pay salaries. No help, no support, no nothing!

name: RR
review_body: This is just to inform you that I had a ticket opened with Digital Ocean: Ticket #04411411, but I received a scripted response. I am not happy with the overall service offered by Digital Ocean. I then informed them that I had deactivated my account and wouldn't be using it in the near future. If you want, you can check with the above-mentioned ticket number.

name: Yones
review_body: All it's IPs are blocked IPs. Such a waste of time to build an app on Digital Ocean. I contacted them many times and they responded very fast, just to know their responses has no action. They always say... our service is not meant for ... So if I complain about ftp that is blocked by other service providers, they respond that "we suggest you to use external service providers" If I complain about mail server, they respond "we suggest you to use external service providers". If I complain about http server, they respond "we suggest you to use external service providers". So what is DigitalOcean is good for? If I wanted to use external service providers, why should I come to digital ocean? They are the trader of blocked IPs.

name: Arnold Kiss
review_body: Never use it again. I registered on digitalocean and got my 100$ coupon for using their services for 2 month. In the midle of my trial they locked me out from my account. I asked them for the reason, they said my account got locked because of "security reasons". I didnt get the main reason, they can't tell me it, just "security reasons".I asked them to revover my account, or if they cant just give me 5 days to save all of my data to prevent data loss. I got a message that they can't do it... interesting..... . So all of my data have been lost. I totally don't recommend their services. I suggest you to use big companies' cloud service (google, microsoft-azure, amazon-aws) and beware of Digitalocean, they will steal your data and lock you out from your account.

name: Russ
review_body: Just signed up a client this week. They locked the account with a message saying they are going to delete everything in 10 days. Can't even retrieve any data. When replying to them, all you get is a generic message: Your account was found to match patterns associated with fraudulent behavior, which is a violation of our Terms of Service. After review, we have determined that restoring access to your account is not possible. What a waste of time spending the last couple days moving their sites over. I will be moving my own websites away from DigitalOcean as this is extremely sketchy. --- Update --- Contacted them upon their request and got the following: "Thank you for taking out the time and reaching out to us in regards to the account lock - happy to look into it for you. We have reviewed your request and in order to ensure the best experience for our users, the lock on your account will stay as is for now. To ensure the integrity of our security systems, we cannot disclose which specific factors led us to this decision. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and we wish you the best in your future hosting endeavors." What was even the point? So they will basically shut your account down without giving you a reason. What a crappy company.

name: Kyle
review_body: I signed up for DigitalOcean through their GitHub Education partnership, which gives all new users (who are students) $50 in free credit. This is equivalent to about 10 months of their cheapest Droplet, at $5/mo for 1GB of RAM, 25GB SSD space, and 1vCPU core. DO has been absolutely fantastic as a student, providing enough features for what I think is a reasonable price. It may not be the cheapest when you only factor in the cost of servers, but the benefits of DNS that updates almost instantly, domain name management, free static site deployment with App Platform, and more means that I was able to learn the basics of app deployment all in one space and very conveniently. I will definitely keep paying for this service because of all these extra features and the excellent dashboard experience, especially compared to the clutter of some other services I have used like Google Cloud and Microsoft Azure. However, I do have some cautions. For those new to this sort of thing, stay away from their web console. I'd rather they promoted another tool than have their web terminal available, since it's not very good (doesn't support copy and paste, for example). Additionally, for students and those working on smaller projects, I'd also recommend setting up databases inside of a Droplet, rather than opting for their base $15/month relational database service, which is quite expensive. However, I personally don't think this is a huge issue - if you need the databases at a larger scale, you're likely going to be happy about their data safety and backups, etc. Overall though, DO has excellent features, documentation, community guides and support (even for topics that aren't related to their platform), and in my opinion, offers compelling features for an extremely reasonable price.

name: Stephen
review_header: Just froze my account and shut off allâ€¦
review_body: Just froze my account and shut off all droplets after 2 days of running. No explanation. Their support is not responsive despite using their ticket system. They just completely disrupted everything. Just an awful experience. Will not likely use this company again.

name: NForue
review_header: Like others, account cancelled without warning
review_body: Like many of the other reviews, there is a good chance your account will be banned for "security" reasons without warning and without an explanation. If you are okay with being dropped by a provider without notice or warning and without a real dialogue to figure out what the issue was, then by all means use these guys. However, there are plenty of competitors out there that are easier to use and do not have a brick wall / black hole approach customer support. This review was left with my name and Digital Ocean is more than able to look up the ticket associated with this concern.

name: Bob Loblaw
review_body: My account was locked without warning because of suspected "fraudulent" use. I asked what in their definition was fraudulent use and I was told that they couldn't disclose that information to me. I requested account closure and was sent a guide on how to close my account by using my "account profile" that they locked. After I opened a ticket to close my account I was sent a response that had nothing to do with account closure. It stated that they had cofirmed my data and payment info. Then they reminded me that my account was suspected fraudulent and couldnt release any details. It is 12 hours after the account lock and they still haven't closed my account with 0 balance due. Overall an unprofessional experience. I would steer clear of DigitalOcean.

name: John Lambert
review_body: Not the cheapest VPS service. However, servers speed are pretty fast and interface are pretty easy and intuitive. Use it several months per year

name: LG
review_header: Iâ€™ve seen adverts for this everywhere
review_body: Iâ€™ve seen adverts for this everywhere. I had a task that required some non-stop horsepower that i couldnâ€™t do at home as I usually do due to working from home in the current climate! Great, I thought - letâ€™s get a droplet I keep reading about and do it there. Firsty, they gated me from seeing any of the plans before I paid money from my PayPal which I did. I then went to spin up the droplet I required and was met with a message telling me I couldnâ€™t get it because my account needed additional authentication and to raise a ticket. The ticket asked me what I needed this droplet for - I explained and to their credit they got back to me fairly quickly. Their response however was shocking. I wonâ€™t paste the full email trail, but basically they told me they wouldnâ€™t be giving me the droplet I wanted until I used lesser services. Upon challenging this as I literally have zero use for anything lesser, I was told they would let me do it if I deposited $500 into my account from PayPal. Even if I used what I wanted 24/7 for a month, it would cost $100. Well bravo on making sure you havenâ€™t got my custom, I hope it was worth the unnecessary gatekeeping. I asked for my money back and went to Linode. Got what I wanted immediately. Would never recommend Digital Ocean service to anyone after my experience. --- Edit --- Appreciate reaching out after the fact to try and help me, but my accounts already been purged as per your own processes to get my refund. The ticket number from the email subject shows "[ ref:_00Df218t5m._5004P1MSfqB:ref ]" my project had deadlines so I have no use to get any services from you now, but I would seriously take a look at this and ask yourself why you are gatekeeping new customers and losing yourselves business.

name: ÐžÐ»ÐµÐ³ Ð¨Ð°Ð¿Ð¾Ð²Ð°Ð»
review_body: Very slow server, I am using it through Cloudways. Some category on my Woocommerce with 200 items load 20 sec - its unbelievable.

name: bogdantheman
review_body: Good prices, documentation and quick customer support.

name: SimplyTrackIt Dev
review_header: DigitalOcean deleted our droplet and all backups
review_body: I hosted with DigitalOcean for about 5 years with no problem, faithfully paying with a credit card we kept on file within our profile. In November 2020, the card expired. Rather than bill me for the month of October usage on November 1, DO didn't even try to bill the card, because by their reckoning it was expired, even though the card was good THROUGH the end of November. Notifications from DO went to a mailbox we rarely check, and we rarely logged on to the DO server since it was a running an application that needed no attention. Thus we never received any notifications about the "expired" card (again, expired by their reckoning). BTW, we also had a mobile phone on file to receive texts for 2-factor authentication. Not once, did DO send a text alerting us to our past due balance. When December 1 rolled around, the now truly expired card should have missed its first payment. However, in the case of DO, it was now the second missed payment. On December 6 we found that our application wasn't accessible. Upon investigating, I realized that the card must have expired. No problem - I went online to provide the new card and to pay the two outstanding invoices. After waiting a few minutes more and still unable to access our application, I started investigating and found that DO had deleted our droplet and all backups. DO's response was, "we're truly sorry for the inconvenience, but you are welcome to create a new droplet." I thought, "ARE YOU KIDDING ME?" Hell will freeze over before I use DO ever again. Other vendors would have simply frozen our data and system until the bill was paid. DO's policy appears to be one of vindictiveness. In other words, you don't pay your bill on time and we will punish you. We don't care that you've been a loyal customer for the last 5 years. That episode cost us an investment in a custom time-tracking system we developed at the cost of several thousand dollars and hundreds of man hours. It also cost us about $3,000 in lost billings, plus another 30 or so hours of time recreating as much of the time records as we possibly could, plus the embarrassment of having to explain to our clients what happened, plus the effort to find a replacement system. Do they care. Not at all. It's not their problem but rather someone else's. We've moved on, licked our wounds, and learned from the experience. I'm sharing my story to hopefully make others aware of the risk of doing business with DigitalOcean. Buyer beware.

name: Raha Mohebbi
review_header: Unreliable services, Docker doesn't work. Emails don't work. Nothing works
review_body: I have been using Droplets for more than a year now. I am very careful with what I do but I have noticed that in the last couple of months their services are increasingly unreliable. My Droplets stopped working. The customer service gives really useless answers. I am running a business here and my customers are leaving because of this. I am considering leaving them all together and go with a better company like Azure or AWS. I can't just migrate all my services but I think it's time now. Update: I wanted to share my experience with this. After posting here automagically DockerManchine issue disappeared but the support team continued to give me some random solutions to my problem. I think DigitalOcean can help customers more than they are currently doing. If you can fix my problem through Trustpilot, why don't you do it as part of the standard resolution pipeline?

name: Kennan Stanley-Bey
review_body: I moved from Belgium to the US and needed to update my payment information. After trying numerous times to add a standard Visa debit card in place of my old Belgian credit card which always resulted in an error, I tried reaching out to Digital Ocean for assistance. They essentially just said try again or deactivate your account. It looked like their response was just a copy / paste template... I really don't think they even read through or looked at the screenshots I provided. In the end I just took them up on there offer and just deactivated the account. Their support is non-existent...

name: Charles Davis
review_header: My DO experience has been very good.
review_body: I do not understand all these bad reviews. I have been using DO for several years and am quite satisfied with their performance. I would not know if their customer service is responsive as I have never had occasion to use it, reason being that absolutely everything is covered in their extensive documentation.

name: georges maxim
review_header: I am using them to host my sites and myâ€¦
review_body: I am using them to host my sites and my app services, i have an app in the app store, and they work great. I cant say anything bad

name: Nils Erlandsson
review_header: Number one SPAM-center in the worldâ€¦
review_body: Number one SPAM-center in the world right now!

name: mikeEU
review_header: I am almost 10y on Digital Ocean andâ€¦
review_body: I am almost 10y on Digital Ocean and never but NEVER had even a small problem. I never called support. Created over 50 droplets with different performances and they have been charged as declared in the price list. So, I do not understand people here talk bad about the most trusted hosting provider. Maybe they have to increase performances for Spaces but that's not so important.

name: Iain McGilchrist
review_body: A nightmare. I signed up, and after a year or two wanted to switch providers. They made it as difficult as possible to close my account: when I finally was enabled to do so, they carried on charging me. My credit card company put a block on them; my credit card refunded me for three moths I should not have paid; and now they have found a way of unblocking their access and they are carrying on charging me for a further three months! Only my credit card company seems to take it seriously: digital ocean is a fraud. If you take my advice steer well clear.

name: Anas Rana
review_body: A FRAUD Company Beware Firstly, they do not have a phone number. The only way is to send an email to Support. They will get back to you after a long time with NON-solution and will direct you to their website Support page. After being extremely dissatisfied with support, we closed our account. In order to close the account, you have to delete your account. Now it's the 3rd month they continue to charge us. We have sent numerous emails with no response. Every time you send an email there is an automated response telling you to connect with support by Signing in. Now we don't have an account so we can't sign in to lodge a complaint through their online form. While we don't have an account they continue to charge us. Please Beware and choose a company that can respond to you both by phone and email.

name: Humberto De Las Casas
review_header: This is the WORST company for customerâ€¦
review_body: This is the WORST company for customer service! It is completely unacceptable how they deal with their customers. They don't have a phone number, they don't answer emails, when they answer after a long wait, they provide you useless information. I can't believe how they became a big company with that so bad customer service.

name: S. McN
review_body: Terrible customer support service - rude, unprofessional, only interested in profit scheme even in useless cases/illegal bank transactions take days to recover - centralised platform team need to think differently

name: Sven Esser
review_body: Without any notice or info they locked my account. Now I cant do my job for clients. I contacted support and it took a bit of work to get them to help me. Now the problem is solved.

name: Eslam Samir
review_header: He very responsive and chargeback myâ€¦
review_body: He very responsive and chargeback my money!

name: All Time Gadgets
review_header: Its not at all good an option
review_body: Basics droplets are good. But if you are looking for high-end high-performing servers it's not a good choice. I had a top-end server with 192 GB of Memory & the monthly cost was around $980. The server performance was too slow. I migrated the server to different service providers on 128 GB memory server with the monthly rental of $170 the the server performance was better than DO. I wasted my money & time with them.

name: Hkan Socan
review_body: dude i got locked in 20 minutes like what ? paid $5 via paypal and i saw my droplet stopped and then i received this message "your recent account activity is atypical, weâ€™d like to better understand your product needs. To help us in restoring access to the account, please respond to this email message with a description of the workload youâ€™ve deployed on your Droplets and how you plan to use your account going forward." what a scammers.....

name: oti
review_body: Not bad. There are flexibility payment and et cetera. But just a bit expensive and give for me less power. (e.g: 1vCPU, 2 GB ram and 50GB disk = $10/month)

name: AD Dtyu
review_header: WHERE THE HELL ARE YOUR SERVERS???
review_body: I sent this review before even using the service...how stupid of these guys not to put their server locations in their website. This is a joke....

name: EvEloBE
review_body: I'm hosting a small discord bot and a website on it and it works perfectly fine for my case. never had any major problems with setting up and could easily find answers to the fev problems I had.

name: peter goodfield
review_header: An unresponsive source of unremitting spam emails
review_body: I receive multiple spam emails based on various digitalocean ip addresses. I have forwarded them to digitalocean but the problem is unresolved. I have filed a complained with the Better Business Bureau.

name: Stathis Pantazis
review_body: Unimaginably horrible company. I signed up on July just to check out the platform, they required for me to enter my credit card number. No problem, I did. I didn't even use their services, just wandered around the platform for a day and that's it. 3 months later they charged me for my 'September Invoice' and their support said they do not do refunds. This is literally theft. They just sucked my money out of my deposit and refused to give it back. Just stay away from them guys, horrible experience.

name: Mark Kreimerman
review_body: The worst experience with hosting provider i ever saw. While managing a couple of hosting providers, digital ocean claims to be the biggest one, while they are small miserable and have lack of basic customer support. Even do not think to use their services.

name: rickvian
review_header: our server down and the support haventâ€¦
review_body: our server down and the support havent reply for 8 hours

name: Gerjo Greenwald
review_body: We as a media company were looking into a new hosting provider for some bigger company's we represent. Heard good things about the technical setup so i wanted to test this. So, let our accountant department sign up, let them made a prepaid deposit and instantly the account was locked. Support responded after sending 3 emails in a 2 weeks or so. They bluntly said it was fraud. Ok, can happen, automatic systems are not perfect so i offered to send in KYC documents. But no. They thanked me for my understanding and keep the account locked. "To protect their system". Well, i totally don't understand it. It really put me off and will certainly not consider them ever again. They probably don't care looking at their responses.

name: Edmore Musvibe
review_header: The worst service ever I lodged aâ€¦
review_body: The worst service ever I lodged a ticket for them to look at my dns problem and now its been 24hours and my website still doesn't open. My ticket # is 03646638.

name: Jakub Glos
review_body: I tried to register, but my account get locked too. I used simple VPN to be able to even register. Such a simple workaround for their "security". Since they didn't reply to my ticket for over a week, I am not using this service at all. I am afraid if something goes wrong with the servers, I will have absolutely no help. Do not recommend them.

name: Lynn Griffith
review_body: My account was arbitrarily closed due to alleged "fraudulent activity". I sent in the information they asked for and they reinstated the account. I can now access the account, but all of the information is gone. I have repeatedly asked for assistance. I have been without a website now since the beginning of July. Did I mention that I have a web based business and sell digital products? They seem to have no sense of urgency regarding helping me get my business back up an running. I read some reviews written by people with similar problems to mine. They all got the same canned response with a request for a ticket #. I have already submitted 2 additional tickets to support. It is now 8/26/20 and I still have no website. If you are considering doing business with Digital Ocean I would encourage you to look elsewhere.

name: Henrik
review_header: Digital Ocean is a super hosting company
review_body: Digital Ocean is a super hosting company. I have used DO for the last seven years or so and have never had any problems at all. The few times I've nedeed support, it's been timely, friendly and efficient. The tutorials and user community are super sources of information. The pricing policy is fair and transparent. I know quite a few DO users who are as happy as I am, so I find it hard to believe that all the angry reviewers are fully reasonable people.

name: Jarle Kristiansen
review_body: They dont reply on tickets. Have been witing many days, still no reply. Dosent help if you provide cheep service and you can not get in contact with them

name: Kamal Pabla
review_header: Digital Ocean is a damn Joke!
review_body: Just about the worst service ever. I have been waiting for a response for a few days. I had a bad card on file. I changed the card and paid what was owed. They told me my account was unlocked and here we are 2 days later with a locked account. Some how I was able to look at the activity in my team account and it shows that the DO admin shut down my server. Then the day they told me my account was unlocked, they went ahead and removed it. I swear if they destroy my server, this is will be the last damn thing they do. I will take all my business and tell my other associates to never host on Digital Ocean because they have TRASH customer support. There is NO SUPPORT associated with having a DO account. Digital Ocean is a damn joke!

name: Kofteyusuf IYIDIR
review_body: This is a fraud, I made my account and paid $5 via PayPal and my account got locked, I make a ticket and I got a response 4 days later and they said that my account was locked due to "Fraudulent Activity" but I never did such a thing I just wanted a hosting server.

name: TG
review_header: I truly judge a company by the supportâ€¦
review_body: I truly judge a company by the support it provides. I liked how easy and fast it is to fire up a VPS without going through much documentation. But when I reached for support on a minor billing issue, I haven't heard a thing from them other than an auto response about my ticket has been created. Upon reading other reviews on this site, it seems like their staff is responding to negative comments a lot quicker than on the support tickets. Blaming delays or no responses on Covid-19 doesn't sound professional on a company that show a lot of potential because I myself am a part of an IT team and our users understand the situation very well but that doesn't mean that they have to wait for 2-3 weeks to have their questions answered. My advise to the DO team reading this is to address the pending tickets first, maybe you won't have the need to respond to any -ve comments here. Thank you

name: Jones
review_header: THE WORST HOSTING COMPANY OUT THERE
review_body: I never write reviews online; first, for anonymity and secondly, I don't like propping up just any company. When I write a review, that means I am beyond livid. Digital Ocean is The worst hosting service out there. I wish I could give them ZERO stars. I bought into the hype like all did but little did I know about their service record. RUN, RUN, RUN. This is nothing but headaches for you! I transferred nameservers from Godaddy to DigitalOcean. I started running into issues, they responded after 12+ days...reason? COVID-19. Cut the BS. How come every tech company is handling their support better...even Amazon takes just a day to respond, liquidweb responds within 1 minute, hostwinds.com is the best in terms of documented support! Long story short, I can't do any development until Digital Ocean responds to me...whenever they will... and it's been two months now, I created tickets, no followups, there are no phones to reach out to...JUST POOR SERVICE. ============ Updated to 3 stars because Heather contacted me and explained a few things. Just 3 stars is enough because my dislike of this company is that strong. You can use them if you want...at your own risk.

name: A girl has no name
review_header: Just know that they will start chargingâ€¦
review_body: Update: After seeing my review, they reached out and refunded the fees. Just know that they will start charging you for creating a droplet. I only wanted to test them out since there weren't a ton of reviews at the time. I never had any functioning website, but still accrued usage charges. Was told by customer support they don't give refunds. Stay far far away from this company.

name: Per Svensson
review_header: Like Russian roulette for your business
review_body: I'm not referring to the hardware itself, sure it may be a bit older and slower than the competition, but that's pretty much the only thing that has been working good at Digitalocean. Had a small web hosting company built on Digitalocean droplets for many years until just a few days ago when tickets from my customers started to roll in, they said they couldn't reach their sites so I logged in only to find out the entire account was locked and all servers removed. Thank god for external backups but my life work is currently offline. Took the support multiple days to respond to my simple question about why I was banned and it didn't really solved anything. Keep in mind that they didn't even attempted to contact me to let me know something was wrong, or even that my account was banned.

name: Magnus Lind
review_header: Banned after years of usage without notification or explaination
review_body: Yeah, you've probably seen lot's of reviews like this in the past from people who know they did something wrong but refuse to accept it. Here I'm minding my own business as a loyal customer for many years, until I notice some odd responses from the API, error code 403 access denied so I log in to the site, only to find out that my account was locked a few days earlier and that there should be a ticket explaining why, surprise surprise, no such ticket existed. Created a new ticket to ask what's going on but haven't received a response yet. Been waiting for a few days now... Guess I'll have to migrate to another cloud, they could at least have told me why I'm not longer a worthy customer. But why should they care? they're one of the biggest players around and as soon as I leave 50 other sheep will probably sign up within a few days covering up the financial hole I left. Edit: hello Heather, thanks for a your quick response, I understand that your support system can be flooded from time to time. But I don't consider this "priority by bad reviews" system very good. You have a lot to improve with your support system and your anti abuse system as well it seems. No offense but I'll keep my place in line, most of my customers are already migrated to other providers anyway so I'll keep my business elsewhere until I see some kind of proof that Digitalocean can handle support tickets within reasonable time, especially when it affect lot's of innocent people.

name: Generation WhY
review_body: Contacted Digital Ocean about a fraudulent website being hosted by them. The evidence provided clearly shows that our entire website was literally "copy and pasted" and published on another using Digital Ocean. ____ Update: Digital Ocean responded and addressed our issues successfully.

name: Berz Qwer
review_body: On having finished my project I tried to shut down the working instance but I could not sign in due to some bugs in the authentification process. I was unable to delete my instances so I decided to delete my account. But then I found out that I still have to pay for the unused services. I tried to contact the support center but instead of any assistance the just told me what I knew beforehand -- my account was deactivated. I filed another request for assistance in stopping my legal interactions with DO but that time they just ignored me. So I guess it is the last resort to impact the situation. Otherwise it will be better to take a legal action.

name: Tolanar
review_header: They was one who changed whole market.
review_body: They was one who changed whole market. Sad to admit, but in 2020 they are much worst than competitors that they grow. Guys, you need massive changes inside your company. This is unacceptable.

name: SS
review_body: Terrible company - had issues with the web console to access. Raised the ticket 3 days ago - no response yet and we have no access to the server.

name: Rahul Sharma
review_body: Use at your own risk. They have no support team. I opened a ticket, it's been more than 3 days, the answer is not yet

name: Chamindu Yasitha
review_header: They have deleted my entire siteâ€¦
review_body: They have deleted my entire site withing one hour and send me unable to process payment from the card after 3 hours. Before they didn't give any warning. the best part is they didn't even reply to my ticket. If you are using digital ocean keep backups.

name: Luki
review_body: Unreliable customer support and fraudulent service. My card was being charged while I didn't get fully working services. Recently, I had a server that its service was not fully accessible. After I had done my stuffs based on what they requested, my service was still not accessible for weeks without any response or action from their support.

name: Yuriy
review_body: Block outgoing connections on port 25 for no reason. According to their hidden algorithms, because of which you lose customers and money. No more trust and money for DO.

name: KP Sanu
review_body: Poor service. I raised a ticket 7 days back. No reply. Always error showing digigitalocean account. My website visitors killing this

name: Nick
review_header: Good experience for years, so surprised at the negative ratings
review_body: Having just left a critical review for an appalling company, I thought I'd leave a positive one for one of the companies I rate highly, in this case DO. I have several VM's with them across the EU, US and Asia in place for a number of years, and use extra services such as backups and Spaces. Overall I've found them to be excellent, better priced than Amazon AWS that I also use, support is efficient and helpful, and reliability is good. There are more periods of planned maintenance than one might expect, however our monitoring shows these to have generally no impact. When machines have required migration due to hardware issues, this has also gone without a hitch, and DO have always been helpful in performing migration at a time we have arranged with them when that's been our request. Inevitably they are not going to be the most suitable choice for everyone, but if competent with server management, aware of the risks with any type of hosting and how to manage them, they should be an excellent choice. What I also love is that the filenames of their invoice PDF's are sensibly named with their company name and other relevant details, and not just Invoice.pdf (or worse), showing an understanding of the needs of the customer.

name: Timur Nardinov
review_header: They refunded money and canceled all subscriptions by request.
review_body: Originally, I had an issue with them, as they were still charging my card though I wasn't using them anymore. My ticket concerning refunds did not get answered for a few days. After posting my reivew here on Trustpilot I got in touch with thier support developer Heather, he solved my issue very quickly and finally I got my money refunded without any problems! Personal thanks to Heather :)

name: G.
review_header: Digital Ocean Customer Support Doesn't Help
review_body: Digital Ocean doesn't get back to my submitted tickets. There's no customer support at all. It used to be pretty ok but those days are gone it seems.

name: Ja Red
review_body: I been getting hit on my cellphone from sometime now by a lot of phishing attacks. They all lead back to this company hosting them. I have reported them on their website hoping for them to shut down the scammer. But they haven't I submitted numerous amount of reports anonymously of the course of a few weeks. Also look at their reviews I guess this site for scammers hosted by scammers sounds like a match made in heaven... Not sure if you read this here but. What the attack does is they send out mass text to random numbers. They claim that they are with a housing,help program, or financing. They want people basic info to grab that data sell it to other scammers or they use it them selves. I had a fake email and phone. That go hit by IRS, Microsoft, amazon, and apple scams on voice mail. There was no place to send files on their report system. So couldn't show them evidence. But after this I do not wish to speak to them anyway after them not want to do anything about it for week. I wouldn't recommend hosting with them.

name: Maria Tanjala
review_header: DO deleted years of production after 5 weeks of card expiration - terrible support
review_body: After years of hosting with DigitalOcean, who promote themselves as "startup-friendly", the bank card EXPIRED so they have deleted everything after only 5 weeks. They have literally deleted years of production data in our database and provided zero solutions when asked for support. Instead, we were preached about how to make sure we have our bank details up to date. Appalling customer support, no empathy, zero solutions, no apologies whatsoever - just erase history. If you are a startup, there will be no support at the other end of the line so you'd better be off with anyone else.

name: Blue Amy
review_header: Biggest Spammers nest on planet Earth!

name: Vernon Crawford
review_body: Top quality of cleaning.... from flack ambulance

name: ErinÃ§ FÄ±rtÄ±na
review_header: No support! Not a thing works
review_body: Everything fraud for their system! I can't pay my bill because it does not accept my credit cards. Then they suspend my account and I can't access my droplets but in the meanwhile, they continue to charge. I create 2 tickets for payment and droplet access. 1 week passed still no answer.

name: Tuhaf Coder
review_header: Digital Ocean does not give my backups!!
review_body: I had a server where I installed plesk in digital ocean and hosted several blog sites. Ridiculously, our server and account were suspended under the excuse of abuse content. Although we talked with support dozens of times, although we stated that there was no backup of our websites, we could not even get our website backups. Has anyone experienced this problem before and what can I do about it?

name: John Fordham
review_header: Support does NOT EXIST at Digital Ocean: ZIP - ZERO - NADA SUPPORT
review_body: Support does NOT EXIST at Digital Ocean. If you have a problem you are gonna be all on your lonesome here. If you have a website that is important to you or your business - DO NOT HOST IT HERE.......... ......................................................... Sure here is my ticket # [Ticket #3474643] ......................................................... BTW - support "did reach out to me" but it's the same old BS support.

name: Suraj Kadam
review_header: Pricing and flexibility is nice but Support is NOT
review_body: The pricing and flexibility is nice, but no support at all. You are getting good service from them when it is about resources and all. But if you end up caught into some issues, there is no one to help you via support. email support is very slow.

name: Alex K
review_header: If you care about your data
review_body: If you care about your data. DO NOT USE these people. There are several documented cases, where they've intentionally deleted users data as a way to punish them for trivial, fixable policy violations. You get a warning, if you miss the emails, within about 4-5 weeks they'll destroy your data. Don't get sick for long. Don't go on extended vacation without continually checking your email. You have to stay vigilant if you have a DigitalOcean account, or you might just lose everything.

name: James Halden
review_header: scammers. do not use at all
review_body: They suspended my account after using the FREE TRIAL for 2 days because of "suspicious behaviour" and its now trying to charge me $374.99.

name: Jonas S.
review_body: My account was locked after payment and got the message that my account "match patterns associated with fraudulent behavior, by our automated systems". Wrote to support, but they haven't replied for a couple of days. Sad because I found them on hosting reviews sites with good ratings and wanted to host using their services.

name: Jed F
review_body: support is not good, server performance also poor but I like it.

name: Luka
review_body: Scammers without customer support. After signing up and entering my personal and payment information, I was immediately informed that my account has been blocked by their automated systems due to suspicious activity. I opened a support ticket requesting an explanation which has been ignored for 2 weeks, despite numerous attempts to resolve the issue from my side. They're also ignoring my request to delete my personal and payment information as per EU GDPR law, and close the account, for which I filed a complaint with my local EU data protection agency. Avoid, and use other vendors such as Linode instead.

name: Reviewer
review_body: Good online documentation. I have used Digital Ocean for a short time, and feel that their customer department is slow and less eager to help out. May be their products are more suitable for developers rather than simple non-technical people as they offer infrastructure as a service.....

name: Nicmene
review_body: DO NOT USE DIGITAL OCEAN. Most ISP's will block AS14061. Check your Digital Ocean IP for blacklist. Digital Ocean does not response nor take action against abuse. They are a hacker/spammer friendly haven. We run servers throughout USA & Europe and have full blocks on AS14061.

name: Naif MS
review_header: THEY LOCKED MY ACCOUNT AFTER I PAIDâ€¦
review_body: THEY LOCKED MY ACCOUNT AFTER I PAID !!!!!!!!

name: Mike D
review_header: Do they even have support staff?
review_body: My simple 1 click install worked great apart from the fact that ports were blocked. I've been waiting 9 days for someone to help me out, I've followed my ticket up multiple time and even gone via Twitter. At least they responded in twitter even if it was just to say they have my ticket, however, even after 9 days since submission, I will eventually just cancel because the lack of care for small guys like us doesn't bode well in my opinion. Luckily, I have access to a range of hosts I trust with my serious stuff.

name: Kevin Walsh
review_body: Fraud Alert!! Digital Ocean continues to charge my credit card despite multiple requests to close my account and stop all charges. "Praveen" in customer service has been completely unhelpful in attempting to resolve this problem. I have asked him multiple times to close my account which has not been used in over a year. The credit card company is refunding charges, but it is extremely annoying to deal with this problem. This is the worst hosting experience I have ever encountered. Beware!!!

name: Alan Patterson
review_body: Locked my out of my account after taking payment - have issued a refund but no explanation as to why account was locked at all and no response to support tickets. Very shady.

name: vendin
review_body: I am an ordinary programmer! I worked for several weeks in the digital ocean, everything was fine. At the same time, I was waiting for VPC function, I even talked with support about this. Ticket [# 03389762] I want to enable VPC for my account. At the github I talked with the developers when the functionality appears. github terraform-providers/terraform-provider-digitalocean/issues/415 When it was added, I immediately used it in my project. And Digitalocean blocked my account without explaining the reasons and did not tell me anything. I have 2 tickets with support since April 29 2020 (more 10 days), but they answer me stereotypical template, and in no way help me solve the problem. [# 03432097] Unfair account lockout [# 03412762] Verify Your Account. Please do not repeat the same thing that you write to me constantly. I used the digital ocean, I really like it. I sincerely want to use your service and not go to your competitors, I like Digital Ocean more than Linoda, GCP, AWS, Azura. What should I do to regain access to my account? What have I done wrong ? Why did I deserve such an attitude? I am ready to provide all the documents and pay. Help me please.

name: Mustafa ÅžentÃ¼rk
review_body: To the owners, I am 46 years old. My fourth university i am still studying at YÄ±ldÄ±z Technical University Computer Engineering program. My second year in school. You can call by phone or mail to university about me. Last nigth 09.05.2020 at 00:05 am i was surfing the internet. I saw a add in Github Pages about the Digital Ocean (50usd free for the github education users) and i wanted to use this opportunity. When i came into digital ocean it me showed that 100USD is free if i join. I decided to join the site. I did whatever the site the digital ocean said to me. I gave the credit card details. I gave My passport fotocopy picture. Then for the validation i used my webcam to send them online for 20 minutes. Then afterwards i gave my telefone mobile number and live contact pictures and videos for 1 hour we established i gave all the details they wanted from me about me. Approximately. more then 1 hour spend my time but i finihed. Afterwards the screen said that it is not acceptable. my APPLICATION did not accepted. Since 46 years, i did not feel this kind of small. It was awful. I am Mustafa Senturk and i am 46 years old and i am a university student and i am a educated github user and I did every thing the digital ocean site wanted from me . All things happened are recorded. And also They are also record all things happened to me. I wrote them several times, emailed them for this abuse to answer back to me for apologize but Unfortunately. They still go back to me. Afterwards never mind, no need to back. This is a racizm. Totaly racizm. Abuse. And all of my rights are secret and i will go to the international court for these disgusting behaviour. Mustafa Senturk

name: Andrea
review_body: Good service, best price!

name: Asaad Naeem
review_header: Not only does their support suck theyâ€¦
review_body: Not only does their support suck they wouldnâ€™t refund for me services I never used. I made an account with them and paid but when I realized they donâ€™t use c panel I cancelled. 5 weeks later I get a charge, turns out auto billing was active by default. When I emailed them asking for a refund they didnâ€™t address the refund just gave me instructions on how to turn auto billing off. I had to email again regarding the refund and 3 days later I get a response basically saying that canâ€™t do it. Unbelievable. No wonder they have such bad reviews, I would steer clear of this company.

name: Viktor S
review_header: Hosting tool set is fine and very userâ€¦
review_body: Hosting tool set is fine and very user friendly, but prices are questionable. I Had no problems with support.

name: ALEX8
review_body: IS SHIÐ¢ ! My account locked after a card binding ! And support does not answer more 3 daysâ€¦

name: Nonn
review_header: Zero support and their IPs areâ€¦
review_body: Zero support and their IPs are targetted by bots for ddos/vulnerability attacks leading to increased resource usage. Switched from my shared hosting account to digitalocean and large scale bot visits spiked, been happening for days now and I am certain it is because their IPs are targetted. I'd recommend trying another service instead of Digialocean.

name: AVENTUM International Gameservers
review_body: DigitalOcean may have decent hardware, but poor customer service. If you opt to go with DO you should be well aware of your ideas and how to do it, as you can't expect them to assist you if something goes wrong. Pricing is average and products are not outstanding though not bad and ok in what you get. 3/5 from us

name: Ameen Cp
review_header: Worst costumer service, Don't think about starting an account there
review_body: DO Block my account immediately after registration, I still don't understand why do they do that, I even submit my passport copy (I don't what they going to with that) and verify my account. then I open a ticket on 24 April 2020, today it's 28 April. 4 days after I still got any response from them and the best part is that they didn't forget to take my 5$ from my card and they have my credit card details.

name: Nate M.
review_header: I've been using DO for a while
review_body: I've been using DO for a while. I have dozens upon dozens of droplets with active sites on them. They are affordable, have good support and never had an issue. Would highly recommend for pros.

name: customer
review_header: They blocked my account without regular reason
review_body: They blocked my account immediately after registration stating that it was fraudulent behavior. After few messages and WEEKS they allowed me verification process where system could not verify my id and current photo. Then I requested to do it manually. After few alerts and WEEKS they still have not answered. Very poor service. Very unresponsive customer service. I DO NOT RECOMMEND!

name: Phoenix
review_body: We've been using Digital Ocean for a while now, hosting several production servers, and mostly they've BEEN good. However recently, just at the same time as they had major upstream networking issues, our servers started having intermittent connectivity. Our monitoring shows the systems unavailable for several hours in a 24hr period. Of course, after confirming that our servers were running correctly, we lodged a ticket with DO requesting they review the network. Still waiting several days later... I moved our production workloads last night to another provider and, without any changes to the VPS or code (apart from living on a new server) everything is back up and stable. I certainly don't expect a system to be flawless, but several days without response to a critical networking issue makes them untenable as a hosting provider. We won't be going back.

name: Anibal Damiao
review_body: 2 months waiting for legal at DigitalOcean to reply to a very serious legal issue that's sheltered by Digital Ocean. Please consider how you'll get support by Digital Ocean when you happened to need help if you rely your business critical systems in this kind of standard.

name: Remco Zwaan
review_body: Hi, Sends few messages now to DO with no response. Must we wait for a week to get any response? Idea to add more personal to help YOUR customers. We migrating our platform from DO to other company that respond with few hours and also allowed to call them if their are urgent problems. And we pay less. I see a lot of negative reviews about DO. Where is the managent to take action??? remco

name: David Ajawu
review_body: There is nowhere you get VM's at the price digital ocean gives their customers. Almost all of the bad reviews are due to billing issues so pay on time and you are good to go.

name: Dheeraj Mishra
review_body: very bad support no one reply me from last 1 days

name: Cello
review_body: DigitalOcean is a software pirates' safe heaven and a hoster behind many notorious software piracy websites such as mactorrents.io, godownloads.net and others. So, DigitalOcean and its directors directly benefit from copyright infringement carried out using their services. The Digital Ocean abuse team seems to be either outsourced to the third-world countries or no-existent. it is only able to send automated replies and not taking any action for weeks and months. I believe this provider should not exist, and its directors and administrators should be taken liable for damages caused by their inability to act in accordance to the copyright law.

name: Ethan
review_header: Locked my account for trying to payâ€¦
review_body: Locked my account for trying to pay them. As soon as the paypal transfer went through, they locked my account and began ignoring my emails. They told me that even APPEARING fraudulent to their automatic system (By...paying them? No idea how I tripped that) is a violation of their TOS.

name: Ryan Leach
review_header: They were good until I was randomlyâ€¦
review_body: They were good until I was randomly locked out of my account and all my projects went down. A real big embarrassment for me in front of my clients who active production servers went down. Still no response 24 hours later. I will be transferring all my accounts to another provider and no longer referring to digital ocean any longer. This is really bad service... In response to digital ocean, too little too late. I'm switching all my accounts to AWS, it is really telling that I've gotten a response here before I've gotten a response from their help desk! I'll wait in line like everyone else then delete my account.

name: Yan
review_body: Created a brand new account for the first time and gets blocked!!!! Yes blocked ! Awesome speechless !!! After that impossible to speek with someone. Poor sell service . Please save your time and money, dont go there.

name: floydeus
review_body: Account automatically locked on purchase with no reason behind it. Support ignores you

name: Caleb Henry
review_header: Cheat! Stay away from Digital Ocean.
review_body: I have two emails, both received an invitation to sign up for a 60-day trial for $ 100. After payment, we discovered we were cheated by Digital Ocean. Even though after that we're so kind to send a nice ticket to them, but their support team always has different reasons to refuse. I want to emphasize this, I currently use the services of 3 different providers for our customers and they are all professional. Although monthly I pay our server thousands of dollars to maintain customer website. It mean, I don't want to have my money back, I just want to say don't send email around and cheat people like that. This is 2020! I thought maybe I should try Digital Ocean at their invitation. But I received the most terrible experience. I want to emphasize that I do not regret that $ 10, because I still pay thousands of dollars for my services. But the feeling of being cheated is very bad, very bad! Stay away from Digital Ocean.

name: Md â€œSerajâ€ Alam
review_body: After payment my account is locked. No mails - No information. The support does not answer me and my ticket does not get attention. Scam Company

name: Daniel M. S.
review_body: Used digitalocean for years without problems, until a created a big droplet for testing something a couple of minutes. Ended the testing, destroyed the virtual machine and done, about 4 dollars of billing, everything was fine. And suddenly, more than 300 dollars were charged to my card, and they only answer with automatic responses. Their customer support does not exists at all and a single fail of their system will get you into this kind of things. Stay away. For real, there's little difference between this and a scam company.

name: med bouzid
review_header: I hate to leave negative reviews, but read carefully
review_body: I hate to leave negative reviews, but you can take a lesson from what happened to me: My credit card got expired and I was waiting for a new one to arrive (things happen in life right?), so I was nice and I DESTROYED all my droplets to prevent more resource-consuming but at that moment I had already $3.24 waiting for payment (which is pennies, and I love to pay it x3 or x10 no problem at all, allow my card to arrive and I will be smiling paying it x10 no problem), BUT... Because most of VC funded company like DigitalOcean are in the game for money alone, they started to send me tons and tons of emails like crazy, here is a screenshot: i.imgur.com /hXRc1ge.png (remove the space after .com) I wish I can show you the full list, there are more when I scroll, all are from digital ocean harassing me to pay that $3.24, it was crazy I was losing my mind, even spammers don't send that much of emails... KEEP READING PLEASE... I contacted them telling them to stop this, and that I will be happy to pay it doubled or tripled or even more, I don't care I just want them to stop this behavior, and for the record, I love to pay the services I use and I love to support others businesses (I'm that kind of loyal customer) BUT... unfortunately, we are just numbers for them, so someone of their support replied to my email saying: "We apologize for the inconvenience... However, the most effective way to do so is to either pay off the balance and/or deactivate the account." So imagine yourself, explaining your situation to someone, then terribly he/she replied that the best way to stop those emails is to pay or deactivate my account (my GOD I explained my card was expired and I will pay once it arrives...), how it comes they claim to have good support? That was the reply I got after some days (and yes they have slow support, imagine what will happen to your business waiting for them to tell you BS at the end) CAN YOU SEE THE PICTURE? BUT terrible than that..... THEY SUSPENDED MY ACCOUNT and flagged it for ABUSE!!! can you imagine this? You ask them for support/help and they say.. sure, we are going to flag your account for abuse and suspend it, crazy!!! see this ---> i.imgur.com /CHGx7Ca.png (remove the space after .com) So, I got someone I know to send me $5 to my paypal and paid that $5 just to cover their $3.24 and you know what, my account is still there blocked, I never saw a greedy, money hunger like this in my life, CAN YOU TRUST DIGITALOCEAN FOR YOUR BUSINESS? It's up to you, but once you miss a payment of $1 you will see how happy they are to support you as you support them... some people forget where they come from and forget that without people they are nothing, sad reality, and there is no wonder if someone from their money greedy company writes me a comment with their "We apologize..." style, we are not stupid, people are smart, this is 2020 Anyone reading this, look at other comments here in trustpilot, you will conclude that they use the same pattern to treat people like junk, they don't care for anything other than your money, and don't listen to the very few 5 star comments, these people haven't faced any minor issue yet to see the other face of DigitalOcean. In the end, I think I can give DigitalOcean a decent advice (if they have someone to listen at all)... people don't need more "fashion" features... so instead of chasing new features, grab friendly humans and understanding people to serve us "THE PEOPLE" quicker and nicely, teach your staff that customer is KING ;) oghhh I know... VC capital doesn't understand this!

name: Dorian London
review_body: Great product. Their comprehensive knowledgebase has made setting up a new server very easy indeed and just what I was looking for

name: Rajkumar Maity
review_body: one of the worst service. they give you fake trial credit of 100$. I felt in this trap, I was trying out their free credit, without even usage they charged me. F#Ck offffffffffffff. don't use it. I should have seen the review first in Trustpilot.

name: Sintax
review_body: Up on inserting billing information, the account gets automatically locked. When opening support ticket about it, no one is even bothering opening my ticket to give me a some vague answer or ask additional information. Worst part is, I have no idea what is being done with my data. Right now my credit card information is sitting in their database, while I have 0 access to services. It is basically phishing.

name: Peter
review_header: Sudden outage, no response from support
review_body: Was hosting servers with them for more than a year now. Unfortunately my Kubernetes cluster suddenly broke and I could not repair it myself since a server hangs and does not let itself reboot or delete anymore. All attempts through their control panel failed so I raised a ticket. The entire cluster is down, so I need a fix soon! No response from their support for hours and hours and their system is broken. No 99,99% by far this way! I do not recommend them because of very bad support!

name: Bubenda
review_body: Great experience and nice prices compared to AWS or Google Cloud

name: Abdel
review_header: I sincerely like the product but megaâ€¦
review_body: I sincerely like the product but mega disappointed by the lack of SUPPORT. I would honestly recommend them over AWS and AZURE with a proper support even just a chat. If you could have just a Chat you could discuss you problem. Instead what happens is the following You send a ticket, after 2 or 3 days you get an answer. You realize the support Engineer did not understand the problem, so you send more screenshot and more details. 1 or 2 Days letter another engineer takes the ticket but he does not read the initial email but only the reply. He answer the wrong question. You lose more ... Few Days later. You restart expplaining the entire problem from the begginning, putting in ticket the issue. NOW Hopping the next engineer will maybe understand the issue.... Still no reply NOR Recommended for critical business as you might lose your customers if something gets wrong. PS: The issue might be from DO or might from the customer this is true. But with proper support you can get help to identify the origin of the problem

name: Lee Wisener
review_body: I have been using DigitalOcean since 03rd March 2013 (first billing date) and really happy with them through the years. Would highly recommend, no idea why there are so many negative reviews, well, if you read between the lines of the comments you will understand why ;)

review_body: I am a 20 year IT professional, specifically a DevOps and Cloud Architect. Digital Ocean are an absolute shambles. Their billing system is completely broken. I have been over charged massively over the past week and their billing team are unresponsive. I am seeking refunds through my credit card company because Digital Ocean are still failing to respond. I will advise everyone to avoid Digital Ocean. Use Google, Azure or Amazon. Or if you want a cheap price, try Linode.

After I tried to register with Digital Ocean, adding my digital Revolut card was declined, then tried with my Visa credit card, it was declined as well, the account locked but still, they CHARGE ME. review_body: DO NOT USE IT its really scam they took 5$ from my card and they locked my account and i never used DigitalOcean before this time, the card is mine all my information are correct i asked the support and they said "Your account was found to match patterns associated with fraudulent behavior" which doesn't make any sense i never even created an account or a server SCAM

name: M L
review_header: I got locked out of my accountâ€¦
review_body: I got locked out of my account immediately after paying 5$ through PayPal. Contrary to what the assumptions of certain users here might be, I am not an international cybercriminal, just a developer in London who's starting out and building my first projects. Wrote to customer service, got nonsensical reply along the lines of 'we have reviewed your account, but it is still locked'. At this point, it isn't customer service but pure guessing game. Why did they lock my account? What do I have to send them to verify my identity? Is there a number I can call to talk to a human? If there's anything they could do to restore my trust, for example that in the future I might not find myself locked out of a big project at a crucial time, then it's more transparency around how access to my account and projects is managed and how I can interact with humans at the company to solve any misunderstandings. Currently, it's just not good enough, and I will be taking my business elsewhere.

name: Alistair Glemnorangee
review_body: Do not recommend AT ALL. Closing account for no obvious reason and continue to charge for VM not availible. Support seems to be non existant. Happy that i was testing and not trusting them missioncritical data.

No support, do not answer questions about the reasons! Horrible service and hosting. For years in the interne for the first time I see such poor quality.

name: Äáº·ng Thanh TÃ¹ng

name: Oliver
review_header: it works but not the best
review_body: ok it works but not the best

name: Eric Griffiths
review_body: DigitalOcean provides the best unmanaged hosting I have came across, when it comes to performance per cost. But I can actually understand why the negative reviews here. D.O. is not for everyone. It is targeted to Web Developers and technical people who know how to manage and set up servers. They also assume that you know how to log in and manage an account, keep your credit card on file, and how to cancel an account when you are done. Its called taking responsibility. (some people assume that if there is no traffic going to a server they should know you are done with it and not charge you!?) There is almost no reason to ever have to contact support. The dashboard gives you everything you need. Over the past few years I have hosted hundreds of websites and apps on droplets and spaces with no issues. Downtime has been zero. They are even proactive and update servers, letting you know weeks ahead of time of potential slowdowns or downtime, which I have not experienced. They are a very transparent company, letting you know of potential hardware vulnerabilities and when they will be fixed (like Spectre and Meltdown). Also, the people on here that were locked out, I am sure were locked out for a reason! That is to keep the rest of us safe and provide value for those of us with legitimate hosting needs. Thank you D.O!

name: Vladino VrÃ¡b
review_header: I have been using digital ocean over aâ€¦
review_body: I have been using digital ocean over a year on my staging environment and it works without any problem. I love the UI, it is very user friendly. I never had any problems with the services and i can only recommend.

name: Squirrel Dog
review_header: Account got locked right after payment.
